head: $850 - Charm In a good neighborhood
post: Small furnished studio in-law apartment below main house, on a hill with view of Oakland/Piedmont hills, one block from Oakland Rosegarden and Piedmont border, has own entrance and stairway leading to private outside sitting area. Interior has stone floors, artisan light fixtures, porcelain enameled gas stove with fire-viewing window, and recessed closet and shelf areas. Bathroom has stone floor and walls, a deep claw-foot tub with stand-up shower and porcelain fixtures. Kitchen area has black granite countertops, cooktop, microwave, small refrigerator, and lots of cupboards. Furnishings include daybed with trundle, bedding, drop-leaf table, desk, kitchenware, wall-mounted tv/dvd player with free cable. Unit has its own tankless water heater, own gas and electric meters, free wi-fi, and use of washer/dryer upstairs. Convenient location: one block from Safeway, Ace Hardware and restaurants on Grand Ave.; also near Piedmont Ave., as well as Saturday farmers market by Grand Lake Theatre; 2 blocks from buses and SF carpool pick-up; minutes from I-580. Rent includes water, garbage, cable tv and wi-fi. $1200 deposit.

head: A Beach Town Cozy & Comfortable Minutes From SF!
post: b>SEACLIFF APARTMENTS 300 Palmetto Avenue Pacifica, CA 94044 Phone: 650.355.1049 Fax: 650.355.5467 Email: Seacliff@wres.com Website: www.Seacliff-Apts.com YouTube Video: www.youtube.com/watch?v=axZ9fUe79Ps&feature;=plcp Office Hours Monday -- Saturday 9am -- 6pm Sunday 11am -- 5pm Located in the coastal community of Pacifica, Seacliff Apartments offers spacious apartments with designer gourmet kitchens, ample sized closets and modern touches in every room. Were just footsteps away from the Pacific Ocean and just minutes from San Francisco. Come experience the beautiful sunsets, walks on the beach, and the crisp ocean air. Featured this week is a roomy and spacious 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment home Currently available for only $1,715 a month In a lushly landscaped courtyard setting Updated kitchen with bar top Ample size walk-in closet COMMUNITY Pacifica is located just 16 miles south of San Francisco along the scenic coast of the Pacific Ocean. Known for its natural beauty, Pacifica is filled with numerous hiking trails through rolling hills that overlook the ocean surf. Pacifica offers great fishing spots for surf casting, pier fishing and crabbing; surfing, golfing, biking, parasailing and hang gliding. FEATURES & AMENITIES Enjoy the comfort of your bright and spacious one bedroom apartment. The 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment has generous ample walk-in closet space overlooking lushly landscaped courtyards. Entertain your guests with our designer gourmet kitchen with bar top. Seacliff Apartments also offers a full range of recreation and leisure activities. Take a soothing dip in the refreshing crystal clear swimming pool or relax and lounge in the sundeck area. Want to workout a sweat? Seacliff Apartments also offers a fully equipped strength and endurance state-of-the-art fitness center with deluxe dry saunas. Ready to tour your new apartment home at Seacliff? Simply give one of our friendly leasing agents a call to schedule an appointment. Or, if youre in the area during normal business hours, feel free to drop by! We look forward to hearing from you. We are conveniently located close to public transportation, shopping plazas and highways/freeways. Also, downtown San Francisco with world-class shopping and dining is only minutes away! DIRECTIONS From San Francisco Take Highway 280 South. Exit onto Highway 1 South. Take the Palmetto Avenue exit. At the Y in the road, take the right ramp. Turn right at the stop sign onto Palmetto. Seacliff is on your left. AVAILABLE IN JULY, 2013 * Rental rates may reflect a limited time promotion or discount applicable during the lease term. All rental rates and availabilities are subject to change without prior notice.

head: Beautiful 2800 sq ft Luxurious Condo with Striking Views of Downtown
post: Enjoy striking views from the Downtown SF Skyline to the San Francisco Bay from this luxurious condominium with its own private back yard, constructed only 20 years ago, and largely remodeled in 2009 and 2010. Built on a grand scale and designed on two levels, this elegant house-like residence is perched high above vibrant Castro Street, overlooking both Noe and Eureka Valleys. The open, flowing floor plan is ideal for entertaining or simply retreating to the family room to enjoy the sweet garden outlook. Some of the many specialized features of this home include a gourment kitchen, nine and a half foot ceilings, custom bookshelves, and both gas and wood-burning fireplaces. The Master Bedroom has sweeping views, as well as a generous double closet and Master Bath. The striking hallway with illuminated, built-in glass shelves leads to the two large rear bedrooms, each of them stepping out to a charming rear patio. The property is semi-detached offering abundant natural light throughout, especially in the living room with its new gas fireplace. The front of the living room extends out far beyond neighboring homes, allowing panoramic views from both the front and sides of the living room that take in downtown SF and Eureka Valley on the left, Liberty Hill and beautiful Victorians across the street, and Noe Valley and the Bay to the right. The formal dining room and living room are grand in scale and design and connect seamlessly, making this home perfect for entertaining. Gorgeous deep brown walnut hardwood floors were recently installed in the living room, dining room, family room, master bedroom, and hallway, instilling a sense of grandeur and elegance throughout. The gourmet kitchen was remodeled in 2009 and features gorgeous granite countertops, maple cabinets, hi-end Thermador refrigerator and appliances, and an attractive new tiled floor, and opens to the rear family room. The family room, with a 60-inch Pioneer big screen TV and balcony, overlooks a serene flowering garden and is ideal for contemporary urban living. An attractive wine bar was added in 2010. The master bedroom has sweeping views of Downtown, Eureka Valley, and the neighboring Victorian Ladies. There is also generous closet space and a tiled master bath with separate tub and stall shower. The two rear bedrooms are nicely separated from the Master by a long, elegant hallway, with built-in illuminated glass shelves. All three bedrooms are very large -- each about 50% larger than normal comparable bedrooms. Both rear bedrooms have large closets and walkout access to the rear patio. This house-like residence is perched high above the flat block of vibrant Castro Street and comes largely furnished. Enjoy the convenient access of Muni (bus stop on end of same block) and also an elevator that brings you from street level to near the front door, so you can enjoy those amazing views without having to walk up numerous flights of stairs. Available now. Call 650-968-2647 for further information.

head: Quiet and Secure , walk Every Where!
post: This two bedroom apartment, within an 8-unit mid-century classic on Vine near Shattuck, is in the midst of north Berkeleys Gourmet Ghetto. Beyond this neighborhoods great cafes, restaurants and shopping, BART, downtown Berkeley and UCB are within walking distance. The apartment itself is in great condition with new granite counters and super clean appliances. There are large closets and plenty of storage. Enjoy fresh paint and spotless carpet. The bathroom has been recently updated as well. There is a breakfast nook off the kitchen and a sunny spacious balcony. There is an on-site laundry and off-street parking is included (assigned space). This is a quiet and secure building. Email with questions or for an appointment to view. Sorry no pets and no smoking.

head: Bay View Villas 2 Bed 1.5 ba
post: Water view condo located in central Benicia. Tastefully remodeled 2 bedroom 1.5 bathroom with laundry and refrigerator hookups, carport plus space for parking. Complex has a well maintained pool and public clubhouse. Located walking distance from Raleys Shopping Plaza, Starbucks, Jamba Juice and bus stop. 5 minutes to downtown Benicia Marina, farmers market, wine bars, sushi, Thai and Indian food! Bedroom overlooks Carquinez Straits. Lots of storage and a nice backyard area for BBQ, sunsets, and a small herb garden. Small pet negotiable.

head: SPACIOUS, FULLY DETACHED 3 BR/2 BA LAKESHORE HOUSE NEAR SFSU AND MORE
post: $3,800 per month, 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, 0 half baths, 1800 square feet Spacious Lakeshore House For Rent | (650) 539-8848 Morningside Drive, San Francisco, CA - - (Between Ocean Ave & Sloat Blvd) GORGEOUS, FULLY DETACTED 3BR/2BA SPACIOUS HOME WITH 2 CARS PARKING & LOCATED IN THE DESIRABLE LAKESHORE DISTRICT OF SF 3BR/2BA Single Family House $3,800/month Bedrooms 3 Bathrooms 2 full, 0 partial Sq Footage Unspecified Parking 3+ dedicated Pet Policy Cats Deposit $5,900 DESCRIPTION OFFERING: 3 large bedrooms consisting of 2 spacious bedrooms and 1 full bathroom upstairs and a 3rd bedroom and a 2nd full bathroom that are located on the garage level on raised floors. The 3rd bedroom is a large room that can be used as a 3rd bedroom or as a large family room, home office, etc. All of the bedrooms face the back yard and westward so they get good natural sunlight from mid day until early evenings sunset. AVAILABILITY: August 11, 2013 (possibly sooner!) NEIGHBORHOOD: Located in the quiet, safe, and convenient Residential area of the Lakeshore District of San Francisco and only 3 minutes away from shopping with the Lakeshore Plaza Shopping Center. FEATURES & AMENITIES: - Immaculate and freshly painted interior - Fully detached house with lots of natural sunlight throughout this spacious home - Gorgeous real hardwood floors throughout the entire house - Spacious formal Living Room with a fireplace and coved ceiling - Formal Dining Room adjacent to the Living Room - Bright, eat-in kitchen with ample counter top space, new stainless steel double gas ovens. Also included is a new dishwasher and a refrigerator - Spacious Master Bedroom with 2 closets on the upper floor overlooking the back yard (facing west) - Large 2nd Bedroom on the upper floor with an oversized closet and lots of sunlight - 1 additional very large bedroom and full bathroom located on the garage level on a raised floor (can be used as a family room or home office) - 1 full bathroom with a separate stall shower and a separate bathtub on the upper floor - 2nd full bathroom with a stall shower on the lower level adjacent to the 3rd bedroom (or family room) - Very quiet, sunny, and low maintenance backyard/patio area with lots of privacy and greenry; great for lounging in the sun or the shade! - 2 car parking inside the garage (side by side parking) plus room to park 2 additional cars in the driveway legally! - Central Gas Heating System for all rooms - Washer and Dryer included in the garage area CONVENIENCE: Within easy walking distance to the Lakeshore Plaza Shopping Center (Lucky Supermarket, Bank of America, Wells Fargo, US Post Office, ROSS, and many other stores and shops) SPECIAL NOTE: This home will be great for a family or several individuals such as college students that are willing to share a nice house together! LOCATION & OTHER CONVENIENCES: - Very close to Stonestown Galleria Shopping Center (indoor Shopping Mall) with Macy, great food court, and tons of other stores and shops - Very close to San Francisco State University (SFSU) and about 10 minutes away from City College of San Francisco (CCSF) - Close to West Portal, Stern Grove, Lake Merced, Westlake Shopping Center, and the SF Zoo - Very close to Sloat Blvd, 19th Avenue, Park Merced Blvd, and the beach - Close to I280 freeway and only minutes by car to Serramonte Shopping Center PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION: - Very Close to several MUNI bus lines Muni lines 18, 23, 28, 29, K, and M. that leads to Downtown SF and the Financial District SCHOOLS: - Very close to San Francisco State University (SFSU) - Only 10 to 15 minutes away from City College of San Francisco (CCSF) - Very close to Lowell High School - Very close to Lakeshore Elementary School SHOWINGS: By appointments only - Please send an email to schedule an appointment for weekdays and weekends too! CONTACT: Send an email to: lakeshore4rent@gmail.com NOTE: When you send an email to setup a showing, please include the following information: 1) How many individuals will be residing in this house? 2) Will there be any pets that will be living inside the house? If so, how many pets and what type of pets? 3) Do you have any must have requirements? 4) Is August 11, 2013 an acceptable move-in date for you? 5) Are you a student? 6) If you are a student, will your parents be your co-signers? 7) When can you come over to see the house? Pls give me a few dates/times. 8) Please share your cell phone # PICTURES: Please note that all of the pictures in this ad are totally accurate and real! San Francisco see additional photos below RENTAL FEATURES - Dining room - Family room - Laundry room - Living room - Storage space - Walk-in closet - Dishwasher - Dryer - Refrigerator - Stove/Oven - Washer - Fenced yard - Garden - Yard - Central heat - Cable-ready - High-speed internet - Wired - Garage - Attached - Off-street parking - On-street parking - Fireplace - Hardwood floor - High/Vaulted ceiling - Skylights - Tile floor LEASE TERMS RENTAL AGREEMENT: - $3,800 per month - 12 months rental agreement required - Security Deposit is equal to 1.5 times the monthly rent UTILITIES: - Tenants are responsible for all utilities (gas, electric, water & garbage) PETS - Cats are ok with a Pet Security Deposit STUDENTS: - Students are welcome with qualified co-signers (guarantors) ADDITIONAL PHOTOS Front Exterior Living Room - 1 Dining Room Master Bedroom -1 Master Bedroom - 2 Master Bedroom - 3 Master Bedroom - 4 Master Bedroom - 5 Photo 10 Living Room - 2 Full Bathroom - Upstairs Kitchen - 1 Kitchen - 2 Kitchen - 3 Kitchen - 4 Family Room or 3rd Bedrm Family Room or 3rd Bedrm Backyard - 1 Backyard - 2 2 Car Garage Contact info: Spacious Lakeshore House For Rent (650) 539-8848 Posted: Jun 23, 2013, 3:48pm PDT

head: Architectural Digest Published FURNISHED Home in the Redwoods
post: Architectural Digest Published FURNISHED Home in the Redwoods PROGRESSIVE 2BD/2.0BA $5,950 Mill Valley Mill Valley, CA 94941 View Map Progressive Property Group, Inc. Dace@progressivesf.com Dace@progressivesf.com www.progressiveSF.com Description Featured in Architectural Digest. Designed and furnished by one of the foremost U.S. interior designers. Set in a Redwood glade a short walk from downtown Mill Valley. This 1890 shingle-style, antique-filled, architectural masterpiece awaits a true connoisseur of life’s pleasures. Enter this incomparably FURNISHED home through one of three lovely patios into the bookcase-lined dining room with large overhead skylight. The 8-person antique dining room table plays host to dinosaur fossils, European sculptures, and first edition books. A gracious gallery with displays of mineral specimens leads to the sumptuous living room with more art and antiques, a wood burning fireplace, and a Mason & Hamlin grand piano that has been played by some of the Bay Area’s finest musicians. Lovely windows bathe the Persian rugs and a butterfly collection with dappled light underneath the original exposed ceiling beams. Relax in the window seat and enjoy a tree-top view of the surrounding forest. The kitchen is a chef’s delight containing a mixture of modern appliances and a meticulously restored, 1926 Magic Chef 6-burner gas stove and oven. The center island is the perfect place for cooking or sharing drinks with friends, and there is a lovely patio outside the kitchen doors that overlooks a hidden garden cove. The countertops are white marble and there is an extra large Farmhouse sink for easy cleanup. A Subzero refrigerator and Miele dishwasher complete the luxury. The large master bedroom is a cocoon of comfort and treats for the senses. Built-in bookcases conceal a sophisticate audio-visual system. The bathroom sparkles in white marble with a steam shower and soaking tub. Immediately off the master bedroom is a sun-filled office, sizeable enough for two home offices with ample bookshelves and built-in cabinetry. There is a 2nd small bedroom, which is currently set up as a reading room, with its own luxurious bathroom and shower. Immediately out the French doors is the 3rd patio for more indoor-outdoor living. The rental price includes weekly maid service as well as a gardener. Built by a Gold Rush bookseller from old growth trees, this amazing home will appeal to people who enjoy hiking, reading and music in the midst of unparalleled taste and luxury! Other features of the residence: - Stunningly beautiful gardens with mature foliage, old cherry trees, rhododendrons and fuchsia banks. - 3 terraces with lovely teak furniture and designer pillows and table - A fully equipped kitchen with exquisite cutlery and plate - Custom shelving and cabinetry in all rooms - Wood flooring in public rooms; radiant heat floors in both bathrooms - Designer light fixtures and controls, dimmers throughout - Custom designed window treatments throughout - 42 inch TV - Wired for audio zones with in ceiling speakers - In-unit washer and dryer - Alarm Rent $5,950/month Security Deposit: 2x rent 12 month lease Fully furnished Ready for immediate occupancy Tenant pays all utilities based on prorate sharing arrangement Owner pays for weekly maid service (except major holidays) and gardener Pets negotiable For questions, or to schedule private showing, please email this ad or call Jennifer at 404-906-5449. LOCATION: Mill Valley (address will be provided) CA DRE License 01905856. Progressive Property Group. post: Castro/ Eureka Valley 2BR Victorian Condo in a Garden Setting - PROGRESSIVE 2BD/1.0BA $3,875 161 Hartford Street - unfurnished San Francisco, CA 94114 View Map Progressive Property Group, Inc. Dace@progressivesf.com Dace@progressivesf.com www.progressiveSF.com Description This charming, tucked away urban retreat is situated in the center of Eureka Valley / Castro. This desirable neighborhood is lined with mature trees and beautifully maintained Victorian / Edwardian homes. This unique home, in a sunny and lively part of town, is within blocks of such landmarks as Dolores Park, the vibrant shops and restaurants of the Castro, and just over the hill from Noe Valley. World renown restaurateur Michael Bauers Top 100 restaurants are only blocks away: Delfina, Tartine Bakery, Frances, Chow, and the list goes onâŚ. 161 Hartford is a charming, San Francisco residence that has the ambiance of country living. It is a full, top floor, condominium in a Victorian cottage, detached on all 4 sides with the original faĂ§ade. It has it all - the turn of the century refined aesthetics yet also the sophisticated top of the line modern finishes throughout. Truly a gem! Amazing natural light everywhere thanks to the large skylights and windows on all 4 sides. Functional layout with a light filled living room and large windows overlooking the beautiful, tree lined courtyard. Wood burning fireplace is in the center of the floor plan, shared between the living room and the dining room. Charming, French Country style kitchen with direct access through French doors to the dining area. Back door off the kitchen will take you to a quiet, private balcony in a garden setting. Kitchen features ample counter and cabinet space, stainless refrigerator, dishwasher, disposal, gas stove and hood. Master bedroom is good in size with direct access to the full size bathroom. Bathroom features shower over tub, tiled floors and plenty of storage. Bathroom has been tastefully remodeled, modern and chic yet has the feel of a Victorian. Off the living room, there is a 2nd bedroom which can comfortably be used as an office, with plenty of natural day light. head: Panoramic Bridge and Water Views! 2BR/2BA! Parking & Fitness Center!
post: Panoramic Bridge and Water Views! 2BR/2BA! Parking & Fitness Center! Pet Friendly! PROGRESSIVE 2BD/2.0BA $5,295 400 Beale Street #1807 San Francisco, CA 94105 View Map Progressive Property Group, Inc. Dace@progressivesf.com Dace@progressivesf.com www.progressiveSF.com Description Welcome to The Bridgeview! Located in the hip and sunny South Beach just steps from the Embarcadero Waterfront, the AT&T Ballpark, the Financial District, Ferry Building, the Farmers Market and many area restaurants, galleries, shopping. Sophisticated city living at its finest! The Bridgeview Towers Luxury Condo complex was designed in 2002 by HKS Architects and Christiani Johnson Architects. Full service building amenities include concierge, 24 hour security, roof top deck with BBQ and water views, heated lap pool, hot tub, gym,. This sophisticated unit is located on the southeast corner, offers 2 good size bedrooms and 2 full baths, and PANO Views of the Bay Bridge and water, Treasure Island, and the East Bay hills beyond. The open living room / dining room floor plan has maple hardwood floors, designer lighting, custom window coverings, and mirror accents to enhance the stupendous views. The stainless steel kitchen has ample cabinet and granite counter space, gas stove, hood over stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, disposal, and granite breakfast bar. The custom cabinetry is crafted from stunning birdseye maple. Both bedrooms are good size. There is a private balcony off the master bedroom with dead on views of the Bay Bridge and water, a large closet, double sink with limestone countertops, and en suite bathroom with shower. The 2nd bedroom has gorgeous Bay Bridge views, and is situated adjacent to a large bathroom with double sink and shower over tub with custom limestone finishes. Other features inclued an in unit washer and dryer, custom window coverings, maple floors in the public rooms and high quality Berber carpeting in the bedrooms, plus 1 car deeded garage parking. 12 month lease required Owner pays water and trash removal Ready for immediate occupancy Security Deposit: 1.5 times rent Monthly Rent: $5,295.00 Small pet negotiable with additional deposit 1 car garage parking included ADDRESS: 400 Beale Street @ Harrison Street #1807 For questions, or to schedule private showing, please respond to this email or call Jennifer at 404-906-5449. post: Available September 1, 2013, (possibly earlier) this lovely and upscale 4 bedroom 2 1/2 bath Sebastopol view home is fully updated and lovingly maintained! Some of the home amenities: --Gorgeous views of large valley with mountains and vineyards in the distance. --Large open living-dining-kitchen space, great for entertaining. --Smartly renovated kitchen with gorgeous granite counter and breakfast bar looks out over the great room and onward to the valley views. --Numerous fruit trees on the property - yours for the picking! --Fenced-in vegetable garden with large planter beds and drip system - yours for the planting! --Huge low-maintenance deck for grilling, eating out, and entertaining. --In-deck hot tub with multiple jets and settings is perfect for stargazing at night. --Master suite with walk-in closet, French doors to deck, and elegant bathroom with rain shower, double stone-bowl sinks, and imported Italian tiling. --Two other nice-sized bedrooms with large closets, built-in shelving, and bay windows with seats and storage. -- Fourth step-down bedroom or bonus office with bamboo floor, custom bookshelves, valley views. -- Lovely sunroom off dining area- can be used as guest bedroom or a sizeable and sunny office, has separate entrance! -- Large living room/great room has built-in corner seating, numerous sitting areas, piano, and Hi-Def cable TV. --Two car garage and large (shared) driveway. -- 2 acres of outdoor space includes mature apple and pear trees, gated vegetable garden, gated young fruit tree orchard, and wood-chipped play area with playhouse, trampoline, and swings. -- House conveniently situated 7 minutes from downtown Sebastopol with its quaint restaurants, boutiques, grocery stores, and farmers market. -- In the popular Twin Hills School District, less than 5 minute drive to Apple Blossom Elementary, Orchard View, or Twin Hills Middle School! --Easy commute to Santa Rosa, or Petaluma, or quick pleasure jaunt to Occidental, Healdsburg, Bodega Bay, Napa, or Sonoma. Just one hour north of the Golden Gate Bridge and San Francisco! This country home is comfortable, clean, and modernized. Not to be missed! head: 1890s VICTORIAN HISTORIC LANDMARK--BEAUTIFUL ANTIQUE HOME
post: This one of a kind 1890s Victorian historic landmark is a true showplace for formal entertaining with 11 foot ceilings and would be home to your antique furniture like no other! A formal Victorian living room greets you after the wallpapered foyer with chandelier. There is a formal dinning room, parlor/library room (or second master bedroom), large kitchen, breakfast room and second floor living room. There is a deck off the 2nd master bedroom with a view of the Berkeley hills. Its easy walking to the best shopping and restaurants. Berkeley Bowl and U.C. are close by. The home has two large ground floor rooms (one 200 sq ft and one about 350 sq ft) with separate entrances for office or other home based business use. The ground floor also has a full garage with shop space. It has a fully functional new yet historic kitchen with a $7000 six burner Victorian style stove. There is a beautiful breakfast room adorned by five stained glass windows, bathrooms include a new clawfoot tub, high mount water closet (yes the toilet high on the wall) and modern shower on second floor with victorian tile. There is state-of-the-art underfloor hydronic heat, hardwood floors and fenced backyard and garden shed and patio. The front yard is undergoing a facelift and has a beautiful 1890s wrought iron fence from Pennsylvania around the house with a rose garden soon to come. The house also has a fire sprinkler system and a burglar and fire alarm system. The home is in the final stages of a complete ground up $500,000.00 renovation restoring it to exact historic condition. These photos show the home near completion. All the trim is ornate, door knobs, hinges and plumbing fixtures all have beautiful Victorian detail. There are 8 antique 1890s gas/electric chandeliers (converted to electric) that are amazing. This building is nothing less than spectacular and we would like to find people that would love to live in a mint condition historic landmark! The building is being painted and landscaped now. This is possibly the most historically accurate and well preserved original home in Berkeley. It is one of Berkeleys oldest homes and has been declared a Historic Landmark. Were looking for a couple, a family or an individual, not a bunch of roommates. Its centrally located between Shattuck and Telegraph with easy access to UCB and downtown Berkeley as well as easy access to I-80 and San Francisco. Please email for more info and leave a number to call you back.

head: Spacious One Level on Eagle Ridge Golf Course!
post: Stunningly elegant and spacious! Imagine coming home to this luxurious 4,089 sq. ft., 3 bedroom plus library, management center and wine cellar, 3.5 baths, one-level home on the golf course in the majestic gated community of Eagle Ridge. This is one of the nicest homes in Eagle Ridge! Located in a quiet, upscale neighborhood on the rolling oak-studded foothills of the Santa Cruz Mountains, this home has so much to offer! Front entry has a beautiful stone portico leading to a private courtyard with fireplace and large sitting area! Recently built in 2008, this custom home has many upgraded features. Three bedrooms, 3 1/2 baths, den/media room can be used as library or fourth bedroom. Large master suite with French doors, plantation shutters, huge walk-in closet and views of the golf course and hills beyond. Master bath has marble floors and counter tops, air jet hot tub, and large marble shower with steam sauna. All bedrooms have their own private bath. This home has the most beautiful gourmet kitchen weve ever seen! Granite counter tops, large kitchen island, dark luxurious wood cabinetry, all-Viking Professional appliances, six-burner gas stove with convection oven, plus a 2nd built-in convection oven for those big holiday dinners. Built in microwave, dishwasher, and compactor. SubZero refrigerator in the kitchen, plus a Monogram refrigerator in the manager center ( for those big holiday leftovers); butlers pantry pass-through with granite counters and large walk-in pantry. Exquisite dark wood built-ins in dining room, family room, butlers pantry, master suite and hallway. Beautiful 2-sided marble fireplace in den and living room. Panoramic views of the golf course and foothills from the large and beautifully landscaped backyard. View the stars at night from the observation patio while keeping warm near your attached fire pit. The side yard has a magical Fairy Garden with quiet meditation fountain & sitting area, and walking paths throughout. Zoned heating and a/c. This home has it all and must be seen to be believed! Call Gower Properties for more information and an appointment to view 408-286-8840. Eagle Ridge website: http://www.eagleridgegc.com/layout9.asp?id=249&page;=10083

head: Charming Studio near downtown Santa Cruz
post: Cozy and adorable, furnished private studio with private bathroom, entrance and garden. Unit is attached to historic Victorian house. Available July 18th. Near downtown Santa Cruz (0.2 miles - 4 minute walk) . Easy 20 minute / 1.3 mile stroll to the Boardwalk and the beach. Beautiful historic mission neighborhood. A bus line that goes directly to UCSC is across the street. Close to Highway 1. Furnished studio cottage is 197 square feet. The kitchen has a stove/oven/microwave/toaster/coffee maker/fridge/sink & is stocked with pots/pans/plates/mugs/cups/cutlery/etc. The bedroom has a comfy queen sized bed (Seally Posturepedic) with clean and soft bedding. Mattress and box spring are sealed for cleanliness. Use of hot tub negotiable (additional $230 per month). This would cover costs to maintain and heat. Otherwise we plan on draining hot tub as we do not use it. While the Studio is separate from the main house, the dining room window does look over the garden (however we rarely sit at the dining room table, and would have to stand up and peak out the window to see you -- we wont do this, but I cant speak for our cats). This is a NO-SMOKING property. Also, out of respect for our neighbors, It is also a QUIET property. If you think you may be noisy, this rental is not for you.

head: Beautiful House in Great Neighborhood
post: This is a spacious 1850 sf., 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom house, has vaulted ceilings and crown molding throughout. It has a separate living room, family room, formal dining area, and a large bonus room (10 x 21) that can be used as a third bedroom, however best suited for an office, or storage area. There is a water fall leading into a Kio pond in the atrium located in the center of the house, which is open to the dining area and second bedroom. Marble gas fireplaces in living room and master bedroom make it cozy in the winter. Kitchen has been completely remodeled with new stainless steel appliances, cork floor, and granite countertops. Bathroom has also been completely remodeled with new Jacuzzi tub, glass shower, sky lights, vessel sinks, granite countertop, and marble throughout. Hardwood floors throughout the living room, family room, and dining area. Has a 2 car garage, central air conditioning, along with a brand new roof and has just been repainted. This house is part of a community with a private community park. It also includes a clothes washer and dryer, and weekly gardener service. This house is centrally located with easy access to major freeways (237, 85, 101, & 280). Smokers or pets are not allowed.

head: Beautiful House in Great Neighborhood
post: This is a spacious 1850 sf., 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom house, has vaulted ceilings and crown molding throughout. It has a separate living room, family room, formal dining area, and a large bonus room (10 x 21) that can be used as a third bedroom, however best suited for an office, or storage area. There is a water fall leading into a Kio pond in the atrium located in the center of the house, which is open to the dining area and second bedroom. Marble gas fireplaces in living room and master bedroom make it cozy in the winter. Kitchen has been completely remodeled with new stainless steel appliances, cork floor, and granite countertops. Bathroom has also been completely remodeled with new Jacuzzi tub, glass shower, sky lights, vessel sinks, granite countertop, and marble throughout. Hardwood floors throughout the living room, family room, and dining area. Has a 2 car garage, central air conditioning, along with a brand new roof and has just been repainted. This house is part of a community with a private community park. It also includes a clothes washer and dryer, and weekly gardener service. This house is centrally located with easy access to major freeways (237, 85, 101, & 280). Smokers or pets are not allowed.

head: SF Bay Views Sausalito Home Fast and Easy to San Francisco!
post: Available Now! Showing - Send phone# for an appointment. This is one of the original Bay Bridge and Bay- View 1920s 2 story cottages low enough on the hill that you can walk to the waterfront across from San Francisco in 5 minutes and enjoy your coffee in a beautiful pocket park. Views of SF, Bay Bridge, Angel Island and Alcatraz and hills from many windows and patio/deck/garden seating areas. One romantic bedroom and bath tucked upstairs under the eaves with fireplace and view sitting/writing/baby alcove. Lots of closet and side storage space under the eaves. Downstairs, there is another cozy bedroom and bath, nice sized great room/ dining room with fa wood burning fireplace and floor to ceiling views. Handy kitchen with washer/dryer nook and office/workroom. Basement for sporting gear, wine cellar, etc. Solar water heater saves on utilities. Front view deck, fenced yard. Walk about a block to express bus stop to San Francisco, minutes drive to GG Bridge. Lovely for Marin headlands bike and hike enthusiasts, those who enjoy strolling to waterfront, restaurants and coffee shops, movies, library,etc. Dog run, park and playground just up the street with a basketball court, tennis court overlooking the Bay and the islands and SF beyond. Great for UCSF and financial district employees, use the bus or take the ferry over to SF and power home. One car garage and street parking. A charming and quiet residential area just outside the tourist zone but still an easy and lovely walk to all the shops, movies, restaurants, ferry, and all the downtown festivals and fun. A place you will love living in. Your well behaved pets are welcome, especially rescues. Great seats for Americas Cup! Year lease or will consider 6 month with roll to month to month for additional $300/mo.

post: Available July 1st: This beautiful modern condo is centrally located in Nob Hill, just blocks from downtown and the financial district with easy access to highways and transportation. This is a quiet and highly coveted corner unit, located on level 4 of a 5 story high building, and is walking distance to many great restaurants, bars and coffee shops, as well as a dry cleaners, convenience store and drug store. Recently remodeled throughout, this contemporary one bedroom includes a new queen size bed and Simmons Beautyrest mattress, large closet, full dresser drawers and a desk. The stylishly furnished living and dining area includes a mounted Samsung 42 plasma flat screen and is wired for cable or Direct TV. The modern and spacious kitchen features stone counter tops with an eat-in breakfast bar and is fully equipped with all new stainless steel appliances - gas stove & oven, microwave, refrigerator and dishwasher, KitchenAid Coffee Maker, kettle, toaster, cooking utensils, pans, all dishes, cutlery and more. Modern bathroom has a stand-up shower and vanity storage. In-unit laundry closet contains a new washer and dryer, vacuum, iron and ironing board, including linens and towels. New hardwood floors and recessed lighting featured thruout the condo and double thickness windows drown out the noise from the streets below. (Both east and north facing city views). Approx. 600 square feet Secure parking not included but available nearby Easy access to fabulous rooftop deck with panoramic views of San Francisco. Elevator in the building. head: Stunning St Helena home in the woods yet only one mile from St Helena

Another bedroom downstairs with sliding glass doors which open on to deck, next to downstairs bedroom is updated bath and small room for wine storage, office, or guest quarters. head: Sunny Garden Studio Cottage
post: You will love living in this sunny, studio cottage with its own private entrance in a safe, quiet neighborhood. Parking is on the driveway which is just steps away. The unit is free standing on a lovely yard which allows you quiet outdoor time. There is one large room which affords all kinds of options for design. Everything is clean and in tip-top shape...very appealing. 2 bright double paned windows, new laminate and tile flooring., one large closet, shelves, new counter tops and sink, full size frig, burner,microwave and small counter oven. There is NO full size stove in the unit. The bathroom has a shower, but no tub. It is perfect for the single person who travels lightly. There is some storage in a shed in the yard. Rent includes all utilities which includes PG&E;, Wi-Fi, garbage and water. It is 2 miles from the El Cerrito Norte Bart and 1 mile from the entrance to Hwy.80. If you work in Berkeley as I do, you can get to town easily without using the Hwy at all. I will ask $725 per month, all utilities included, with a $600 deposit, making the move in cost $1325. I will ask for at least a 6 month lease, with an option to extend. I am told that I am a great landlady and I will respect your need for privacy as I know you will mine. I will be showing the unit on Saturday the 29th of June. Please call me and we will set up a time, even earlier if youd prefer. Andrea 510-918-2580

head: Private Cottage in North Palo Alto
post: This is a very nice, freestanding cottage on its own lot in a quiet neighborhood close to downtown Palo Alto. Its a short walk to the center of downtown and the Cal Train station. There are Douglas Fir wood floors in both bedrooms, hallways and living room, with ceramic tile in the bathroom and linoleum in the kitchen and laundry rooms (washer and dryer included). There are several windows that let in a lot of natural light. Windows are furnished with pull down blinds and screens. The kitchen has a dishwasher, disposer, new refrigerator, gas range and butcher block counters. The entire interior has been re-painted. There is a detached garage with a driveway for off street parking. Nice outdoor area with space for table, chairs and a bbq. Gardener included. No smoking. No Cats or Dogs allowed. $3,000 Security Deposit. Local and responsive management, one year lease required. Available now. Please send an email to set up an appointment to view.

head: Temporary - Furnished - 1/br + Office
post: $4,300.00 per month - 1/br + 1/ba, Furnished Corporate Housing + Office Location: Russian Hill Unlike any other you will find, this newly remodeled, well-appointed condo is located in the heart of Russian Hill which is one of San Franciscos 44 hills and one of its original Seven Hills. The condo is located on the second floor of a clean and quiet, stately six-unit building within walking distance of major attractions San Francisco has to offer. With l ots to do - right outside your doorstep, youll find a wide variety of conveniently located stores for necessities, antique stores and modern boutiques; wine bars and restaurants offering every kind of cuisine you can imagine. Shopping and dining north of California Street you will enjoy exploring a variety of shops, coffeehouses and restaurants for every budget and taste. There are many small markets, a pharmacy and a health food store on Polk Street but youll need transportation to get to a major grocery store. Neighborhood Trivia The house that the famous writer Jack Kerouac lived in is on Russell Street. Local author Armestead Maupins Tales of the City series was set on Macondray Lane Much of the famous car chase sequence in the 1968 thriller Bullitt, starring Steve McQueen was filmed on Famous Russian Hill. Among its famous inhabitants if only temporary were writers like Ambrose Bierce, Jack London, Mark Twain, Herb Caen as well as artists like Frank Noris and architects like Willis Polk. Current residents include Mayor Gavin Newsom, Olympic figure skater Brian Boitano and Herb Gold. Please Note OPEN FLOOR PLAN...not conducive to privacy for third parties (there are no doors to the bedroom). Rental Rate: $4300/mo Parking $200/mo Utilities Paid by Tenant Coin Laundry Across Street Dogs OK! head: Macondray Lane Luxury View Home
post: $25,000.00 per month - Macondray Lane Luxury View Home Location: Russian Hill Macondray Lane Luxury Retreat! PLEASE NOTE BEFORE READING: Pictures of furnishings are from staging and are NOT accurate. This fabulous view-home is currently in the process of being professionally decorated by our designer. New pictures are due to be published on or before July 15, 2013. Designed for comfortable living, formal or informal entertaining as well as superior livability, this magnificent, 3-level, single family home is perfect for families in transition who demand top-notch privacy and comfort. Built in 1930 and situated in San Franciscos most prestigious and secure neighborhoods, you will enjoy unobstructed views of Coit Tower, Alcatraz and the Americas Cup event. Unlike any other luxury/view furnished vacation rental you will encounter within the community, from the light and airy feel to the meticulous millwork, molding, flooring and discerning drapery, this home is as versatile as it is elegant. Main floor features a fabulous flow of grand entertainment space perfect for a party of few enjoying a quiet and intimate dinner, as well a larger celebration, a splendid top of the line Chefs kitchen boasting stainless steel appliances, Wolf commercial stove, custom cabinetry, gas range, Sub Zero refrigerator, Bosch dishwasher and a large island/breakfast nook opening to a spacious dining and living area. About the Neighborhood Macondray Lane, named after the Scottish seaman Captain Frederick William Macondray, is an historic pedestrian-only lane a half block from the summit of Russian Hill and is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. Macondray Lane has long captured the hearts of San Franciscans and visitors with its thicket lined tract, alluring cottages, and engaging gardens on the south side of the public path. Throughout the lane, informal landscaped gardens began early in the twentieth century and blend together to create a unique, romantic urban landscape. The Lane was an early enclave for artists and writers, including California Poet Laureate Ina Coolbirth, who was rumored to have been courted by Mark Twain here in the 1860s. In the late 1970s, Macondray Lane was memorialized as Barbary Lane in Armistead Maupins Tales of the City. It was here that one of the main characters, a marijuana growing land-lady named Mrs. Madrigal, chained herself to the wooden Taylor Street stairs to prevent the City from replacing them with concrete steps. One of the founders of the California Communist Party, Charlotte Whitney, lived next door to the property from 1927 to 1945. Public Transportation and Parking Most guests find they do not need a car as there is a Green Grocer, Wine Shop and the Searchlight Market within a few blocks, however we do provide parking for 1-car in a private garage ˝ block away. The property is a short walk to North Beach, Polk Street Shopping District, Chinatown or Fishermans Wharf. Bus stops are just a block away. About the property and amenities  2 large master bedrooms with private balcony  2 large bedrooms  3 large bathrooms  Living room with fireplace and built-in bookshelves;French Doors to balcony with spectacular Coit Tower, Alcatraz and City views  Large chefs kitchen with industrial sized Wolf stove, dishwasher, sub-zero refrigerator and garbage disposal  3 fireplaces * 50 Flat Screen TV in LR * Cable * Wireless Internet * iPhone/iPad/iPod Docking Station in ALL bedrooms * Parking 1/car mid or less vehicle in private garage ˝ block away Contact Information Pamela Kelley 415-509-3431 Pricing Rent: $25,000.00 per month Available Date: Tue Oct 01, 2013 Deposit: 25000 Minimum Lease: 1 Month Included Utilities: NO Property Location Macondray Lane San Francisco, CA 94109 View Map Features Bedrooms: 4 Bathrooms: 3 Parking Spaces: 1 Subdivision: Russian Hill Square Footage: 3600 Agent Name: Pamela Kelley Attributes Appliances Range/Oven Full Refrigerator Washer/Dryer Dishwasher Sink Disposal Microwave Interior Amenities Fireplace Hardwood Floors Wet Bar Kitchen Island Basement Created with vFlyer Marketing Equal Housing Opportunity | VFLYER ID: 228547005 Photo Gallery Created with vFlyer Marketing Equal Housing Opportunity | VFLYER ID: 228547005 All information in this site is deemed reliable but is not guaranteed and is subject to change

head: Temporary Housing, Luxury Furnished 1/br + Parking
post: $3,800 per month - Temporary Housing - Furnished, Luxury Retreat Location: Russian Hill Situated along the cable car line on Hyde Street, you will enjoy hearing and watching the distinctive sounds of the Cable Car chimes from your front windows. Known for its scenic views, zigzag streets and pocket parks, Russian Hill is also home to extraordinary restaurants, night-clubs and cafes. Unlike any other you will find, this newly remodeled, well-appointed 1/bedroom condo is located in the heart of Russian Hill which is one of San Franciscos 44 hills and one of its original Seven Hills. Located on the top, 3rd floor (39 stairs) of a nine-unit, family-owned building and is within walking distance of major attractions San Francisco has to offer. Features include a sunny and spacious one bedroom, eat-in kitchen, comfortable and bright living room and full bathroom furnished with five-star quality linens, towels and furnishings. The kitchen is equipped with oven/stove, refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, toaster, full set of pots and pans and various supplies for cooking. Cable TV, cable modem, Wi-Fi, iPod, and iPhone docking station. With lots to do - right outside your doorstep, youll find a wide variety of conveniently located stores for necessities, antique stores and modern boutiques; wine bars and restaurants offering every kind of cuisine you can imagine. Shopping and dining north of California Street you will enjoy exploring a variety of shops, coffeehouses and restaurants for every budget and taste. There are many small markets, a pharmacy and a health food store on Polk. Walking distance away from the Coit Tower, Chinatown, Fishermans Wharf, and North Beach, Fishermans Wharf (6 blocks away), Union Street/Marina (6 blocks), Chinatown (4 blocks), North Beach (4 blocks), Downtown/Union Square (11 blocks) and the Golden Gate Bridge Neighborhood Trivia The house that the famous writer Jack Kerouac lived in is on Russell Street. Local author Armestead Maupins Tales of the City series was set on Macondray Lane Much of the famous car chase sequence in the 1968 thriller Bullitt, starring Steve McQueen was filmed on Famous Russian Hill. And among its famous inhabitants if only temporary were writers like Ambrose Bierce, Jack London, Mark Twain, Herb Caen as well as artists like Frank Noris and architects like Willis Polk. Current residents include Mayor Gavin Newsom, Olympic figure skater Brian Boitano and Herb Gold. This is truly an apartment for the discriminating renter - a top notch apartment in a top notch location. Located in beautiful Lower Pac Heights just steps from Japan town and overlooking the picturesque Hamilton Park. Breathtaking views of Alamo Square and Presidio Park along with the San Franciscos world famous skyline await you. This unit features a brand new kitchen complete with stainless steel fridge, range, microwave and dishwasher. Additional features include two modern remodeled bathrooms, large closets and an in-unit washer and dryer. 2130 Post offers all the amenities your looking for and more! Whether your looking to BBQ with friends, get in shape or just sit back and relax, 2130 has something for everybody. Some of the amazing community feature available are; * State of the are fitness center * Large Community room w/ full kitchen/ dining and 60 TV * Stunning patio complete with lounge chairs dining table and Community BBQ * Secure bicycle storage with repair center ($25/ month) * Fully equipped business center (coming soon) * Comfortable reception and lounging areas * Laundry and dry cleaning lockers * Individual storage areas available for rent * Underground covered parking ($250/ month) Here at 2130 we know how much you love your pets, and so do we. Nestled in a quiet oasis between the booming Divisadero corridor and prime Fillmore St, 2130 Post is an ideal residential setting. Close to public transportation, restaurants, shops, and countless amenities, you wont even have to get in a car to enjoy your new neighborhood. 97 Walk Score - Walkers Paradise! Enjoy sushi or Udon in Japantown, walk to Out the Door, Woodhouse Fish Co., Fresca, SPQR, Tortilla Heights, Steven Alan, Marc Jacobs, Crossroads Trading Co., Delfina, State Bird Provisions and many other local favorites at your leisure. This continually evolving neighborhood epitomizes classic San Francisco and its quiet streets are a perfect reprieve from the bustle of the city. head: Great Solano Ave Location 1BR Apartment Available Now...
post: If youre looking for a nice and quiet place to live in the heart of Solano Avenue then look no further! Conveniently Located at 1494 Solano in Albany (just three doors down from Safeway), we currently have some of our bright and cozy one bedroom apartments available for move in on July 1st and July 15th. (possibly sooner if you need it before then)! Solano Avenue offers great shopping, dining and entertainment along with a safe neighborhood atmosphere all steps outside of your apartment. This building is only two miles from UC Berkeley and a short distance from several BART stations all of which can be easily accessed by AC Transit line 18 which runs along Solano Avenue. Freeway access is also very quick and easy; this building is in the perfect East Bay location to meet all of your commuting and travel needs. The rent for the apartments range from: $1,175 for third floor unit $1,150 for second floor unit $1,100 for ground floor unit The security deposit is $1,650 Credit checking fee is $25 Water and garbage are included in the rent. Plenty of street parking is available, parking inside the building may also be available for an additional charge added to monthly rent. Sorry, no section 8. There will be an open house for the available apartments this upcoming Wednesday June26th from 5:30pm to 6:30pm. If you wish to attend the open house please RSVP by emailing the manager (1494solanoave@gmail.com) to receive further information. The pictures shown are not the exact apartments currently available, but all of our one bedrooms are identical in size and layout, they just vary slightly in carpets and finishes.

head: 3 BEDROOM, 2.5 BATH EXECUTIVE TOWNHOME (lafayette)
post: LUXURIOUS & PRIVATE BORDERS LAFAYETTE This much sought after beautiful Executive Townhome has approximately 2500 sq. ft. of luxury living with spacious rooms and neutral décor. While private and secluded, it is just minutes to commute access. This is the perfect home for gracious entertaining and enjoyable relaxation. PRIME LOCATION Walk to highly acclaimed LAFAYETTE SCHOOLS; just three minutes to BART, and two minutes to HIGHWAYS 680 and 24. The front door opens to a hardwood entry with stained glass window, coat closet and half bath. Beyond is the spacious carpeted living room with fireplace and adjoining formal dining room with walls of glass, giving both rooms a view of trees and fern filled gardens (automatic irrigation system). Sliders from living/dining rooms lead to this Private Patio. Perfect for entertaining. Feast in the lovely light and bright kitchen has an informal dining area, tile countertops, stainless steel appliances, hardwood floor, and glass wall overlooking the private entry courtyard with plants and fountain. A dramatic family room with a soaring cathedral ceiling, large skylight, wet bar, hardwood floor, and a large picture window overlooks the entry garden plants. Double doors lead to an enormous master suite with vaulted ceiling, wood burning fireplace, walk-in closet, private deck, and adjoining retreat. All are very private and serene with a wall of glass overlooking the garden, with redwood and pine trees beyond. The master bath with skylight and vaulted ceiling has an oversized tub and double sinks, adjoined by toilet and shower alcove. There are two additional bedrooms, each with wall-to-wall carpet, and beveled mirror closet doors. One has a small balcony with sliding doors and a picture window with shutters, and the other a large picture window. They share a bathroom with double sinks, granite countertops, stone tile floor, and a bathtub with shower enclosure. Down the hall, overlooking the entry gate, is the laundry room with window, built-in cabinets, and a washer and dryer. head: Exceptional Rental near Yacht Harbor
post: We live in an amazing home on Schwan Lake in Santa Cruz - one of the jewels of Santa Cruz. The home has a floor plan that is divided into two separate units. We are looking for the right tenants for one of the two units. head: 5Bdrm, 5.5Bath, Bay Views, Custom Home
post: 5 BR, 5 ˝ BATH, STUNNING PANORAMIC VIEWS, ALBANY SCHOOL DISTRICT 2009, beautiful, spacious, contemporary home at the top of Albany Hill in lovely Albany, CA. Incredible sweeping views spanning from Marin, to the Golden Gate Bridge, San Francisco, the Bay Bridge, Oakland, and Albany Hill park. * 4500 sq ft of living space, PLUS a 900 sq ft garage * 9-13 High ceilings through-out the home * Over 1700 sq ft of decks/patios/balconies -- off of family room; off of office/bedroom on intermediate level; off of master retreat; off of upstairs hallway; off of back bedroom * Tons of windows and light MAIN FLOOR: * Large living room with 12 ft ceilings, wood/gas fireplace, bay and city views * Dining room with soffited ceiling open to living room, bay and city views * Gourmet kitchen includes: view of the bay, SubZero refrigerator, Bosch Dishwasher, Viking gas range and oven, two sinks, walk-thorough pantry, granite counter tops, custom cabinets * Large Family Room with space for an eating area or bar * ˝ bath on main floor UPPER FLOOR: * Luxurious master suite with retreat, small deck, large walk-in closet, master bath with double sinks, soaking/whirpool tub and dual shower; great bay and city views from bedroom and retreat * 2 additional bedrooms upstairs both with en-suite bathrooms * Large laundry area with drying closet and plenty of storage conveniently located near bedrooms LOWER FLOOR: * Large office/bedroom/playroom with a view out of the French doors that open to large patio * Large guest bedroom downstairs also with en-suite bathroom and separate entrance opening to large patio * Small extra room * Extra storage space OTHER: * Hard wood and natural stone covering all floors in the house * High-tech, energy-efficient, in-floor radiant heat through-out the entire house * Double pane energy-efficient and sound-blocking Marvin windows * 900 sq ft 2+ car garage with tons of storage & extra space; and an extra room for a small workshop * Ample street parking * Great location a the top of Albany Hill on a dead-end road; parkland/trails just steps away * 10 minute walk to Solano Avenue shops, restaurants, schools, banks, grocery stores including Trader Joes, Ranch 99, Safeway, Andronicos and a plan for a brand new Whole Foods * Walk to myriad restaurants ( http://www.solanoavenueassn.org/saa_directory/food.html ) * 10 min drive to 4th St in Berkeley, Hopkins St, Berkeley Bowl, Bay Street shopping/Emeryville, Westbrae, etc... * Super location for commuting to Cal, Berkeley, SF, Oakland, Emeryville -- walk to local or Transbay buses, BART, and casual carpool pickup location; 2 min. highway access * Gorgeous sunsets Please respond to this email for more information. **No Pets**

Spacious and Light Filled Full Top Floor Lake Street Condominium. Located on one of the citys most desirable blocks directly across from beautiful & family friendly Mountain Lake Park. 1920s details throughout include high ceilings, hardwood floors and period wood work. The condominium starts with an interior ground level entry, the interior tiered wood staircase opens to a spacious upper landing with storage closet. The large front light filled living room features an expansive North facing window, wood burning fireplace and Arts & Crafts style built-in shelving. Separate formal dining room accessed from the kitchen, living room and landing. Updated kitchen with Caesar stone counters, stainless appliances, gas range, dishwasher, new refrigerator and LG laundry. The rear hall leads to the split bath, storage closet, linen closet and both of the large South facing bedrooms, one with walk-in closet. Each bedroom opens to the sun-room perfect for home office, nursery or third bedroom. Garage parking for one car (independent) and storage. Garage has internal access to kitchen. Easy street parking for additional cars. Mountain Lake Park features tennis courts, basket ball, playground, open green space, walking trails leading to the Presidio plus the picture perfect lake. The house is in immaculate like new condition! It is located on a guard-gated private lot with a huge back yard. The community is very quiet and family orientated. This home features 3 large bedrooms, a rec room as a forth room, 2 fully updated baths, 2 car garage, car port, and RV parking. The property boasts a good 2189 sq.ft of living space on this enormous half acres lot. Entrance to the home brings you many wonderful amenities and luxuries to such an open space home. Wonderful hardwood floors are connected from the kitchen to the living room and then to the family room with vaulted ceilings. The Master and other bedrooms are treated with wall to wall carpeting. Great open space Chefs kitchen includes an island, granite counter tops, matching granite back splash, double oven, double door refrigerator, electrical cook tops, built in microwave and abundance of cabinetry for storage. Renters should take advantage of the large backyard, good size grass field great for family funs, BBQ, and entertainment. Landscaping should be worry free as it is included in the rent. A block from the home gets you to Ygnacio, where freeways, BART and buses are close by for great easy commutes. Just minutes from Downtown Walnut Creek! The nearest schools are Buena Vista Elementary, Walnut Creek Intermediate and Las Lomas High School. head: Ask for #211 M/I Aug 1! Last day @ reduced rate + 1 month free/$99 dep
post: This isnt your ordinary apartment home - this is Epic! Epic is a brand new, premier Essex Property conveniently located off of River Oaks Parkway and Montague. Your new home will be a beautifully landscaped and smoke free community, set to create a relaxing and peaceful environment. You deserve to be pampered! With 1044 sf of pure luxury, this gorgeous layout adds style and character like you wouldnt believe! Every inch of space is designed to make your life simpler. Your hide away linen closet in the hallway provides more space for those winter blankets than it appears! The coat closet and pantry are sure to please along with the abundance of cabinet space in your new, open and spacious kitchen. Two master suites on either side create a blissful privacy thats hard to find in an apartment home. Come home from a hard day at work and unwind in our hot tub or at our sparkling lap pool . Your new community will also feature a state of the art bi-level fitness center open 24 hours. Get a snapshot of your sister visiting town, tossing your furry friend a treat over by the Video Game Room - and pop in for a little bit of fun and excitement while youre there. Its all about YOU with an elegant, yet functional Clubhouse lounge featuring a wine bar and outdoor seating area . head: Ashbury Heights Victorian 3+ Bedrooms
post: A beautiful 3-story, 3+ bedroom Victorian on a quiet tree-lined quintessential San Francisco street. The house is in Ashbury Heights, nestled above Cole Valley and Haight Ashbury at 160 Delmar Street. The house has great light and charm. It is about 2200 square feet and includes a one-car garage, a garden, and a front deck. The first floor has a living room with working fireplace, formal dining room with working fireplace, half bath, and kitchen that opens onto a garden. The kitchen also has a separate desk area. The second floor has 3 bedrooms and a full bath. The bathroom has a claw foot tub and separate glass shower. The large master bedroom has views and a working fireplace. The third floor has a large family room with a window seat with a view. The third floor also has a separate office. 3 bedrooms 1.5 bath Living room, family room, formal dining room and separate office 1 car separate garage Kitchen with Viking stove and Bosch dishwasher High efficiency washer and dryer Storage in separate basement The house is available furnished or unfurnished after August 20 (ideal move-in is Sept 1, but we are negotiable). The house is available 11 months until sometime around August 1, 2014. The rent is $7250. References and one-month security deposit required.

head: Beautiful LIVE/WORK LOFT
post: This apartment is a big, light-filled (skylights above) loft in the Fruitvale district of Oakland. Its a large space, includes a bedroom with queen-size bed, an office (or second bedroom), big windows, plenty of storage and closet space, gas oven, refrigerator, microwave, two full bathrooms, washer and dryer, dishwasher. Theres a breakfast nook and plenty of space for a dining area, and big, comfortable living room. The apartment is located off the street, in the middle of the block off 36th Avenue and International Boulevard, in a safe building with really nice neighbors, just 2.5 blocks from the Fruitvale BART station. This means an easy commute via public transport to San Francisco or UC Berkeley (20 minutes), Youre also 10 minutes to downtown Oakland, Lake Merrit area, 10 to Mills College, 10 to the Oakland Airport, close to Highways 880 and 580. A covered parking spot is included in the rental agreement. The complex also includes an outdoor common space (picnic tables, a garden). Neighborhood highlights include best Mexican/Central American food in the Bay, grocery stores, Farmers Market every Thursday afternoon, post office, churches, botanicas, taco trucks, grocery stores, and a post office all within walking distance. You must see this place. Email to schedule a viewing. Available August 1. Cats cool. Dogs negotiable.

Located in the southern part of San Francisco near freeways 280 and 101, there is easy access to downtown San Francisco by car or public transportation. Equally easy access to get to the Peninsula or the S. Bay. You will love Cortland Ave - a 1/2 block walk - to a number of excellent restaurants, coffee houses, shops and bars. head: 2 Bed Apt lease tranfer (Convenient location转租))
post: Because of job relocation, I would like to transfer my lease of a 2-bd apartment in West San Jose. The apartment is located just one street across Westgate Shopping Center (West Hamilton Ave and Atherton Ave). It is available at the beginning of July, 2013 (Slightly negotiable) It is in a very convenient area with many stores (Wal-Mart, Target and many others in Westgate Shopping Center) and bus stations (bus 26, 57, 58, 82) within minutes walking distance. It is a 2-bedroom apartment, 2-level, 1.5 bath, ~900 ft^2 with rent 1539/month, with one assigned covered parking spot. Currently it is month-month lease. The apartment is fully furnished. If possible, I would like to leave all the furniture to you with minimum price. So you can move in just with your luggage. Please see the pictures for the details of the apartment. I believe you need to submit an application to the renting company and pass the credit check to finish the leasing transfer. If you are interested, please reply this email and also briefly introduce yourself. I will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you.

head: A Golfer's delight! A unique and very special property accorss from the Contra C
post: A Golfers delight! A unique and very special property accorss from the Contra Costa Country Club. 1BD/1.0BA $2,275 890 Golf Club Road Pleasant Hill, CA 94523 View Map Stokley Properties, Inc. (925) 482-7787 stokleyproperties.net Description A golfers delight! A unique and special property located accross the street from the Contra Costa Country Club. Historical and charming. This one bedroom, one bathroom home is one of the original Sugar Shack homes built in 1936. The owners have lovingly remodeled this home top to bottom with updated high end finishes and all the amenities of a newer home. The living room is open to a dining area and sports a new gas burning fireplace. Harwood floors throughout and the original Knotty Pine paneling make you feel like you are at Lake Tahoe. The kitchen has been remodeled with a custom stone countertop and farm house style sink and all new upgraded appliances. The bathroom has been completely remodeled with beautiful subway style tile with glass tile accents and all new fixtures. There is a room in the rear of the home for the washer and dryer and could double as a home office space as well. There is a large back yard for entertaining and has lots of room for a garden. A one car detached garage is included and plenty of extra space for parking. Join The Country Club and play golf, swim, play Bocce Ball, social events and really enjoy that lifestyle. Even if you dont play Golf there are social memberships available to join in the fun. A membership to the Contra Costa Country Club is not included in the rent. This is a one year lease at $2275.00/mo. and a $2275.00 security deposit. This property accepts pets with breed restrictions, pet insurance and an additional security deposit. This property does not participate in the Section 8 program. Tenant to pay all utilities and maintain the landscaping. For more information and to schedule a showing please call Jill at 925-482-7787 Stokley Properties is an equal opportunity housing provider. Square feet: 948 Amenities Accross from Golf course New appliances New Paint Washer/dryer Fireplace Hardwood floors Remodeled Kitchen remodeled bathroom Large Yard detached 1 car garage Terms Rent: $2,275.00 Application Fee: $40.00 Security Deposit: $2,275.00 Available Now! Created on 2013-06-23 10:21 PDT

head: July 8th-2br,2bth,2story,1of a kind TownHome-Great Location-Has it All
post: Just in time for the Americas Cup in San Francisco. This large 2 bedroom townhome that is one of a kind designed in the tradition of Frank Lloyd Wright, will be available as of Monday July 8th for a period of 6 months and possibly longer. Located in the Civic Center / Van Ness neighborhood, within the Opera Plaza, this 2 bedroom, 2 bath 2 story townhome has everything. The ground floor entrance area of the plaza has coffee shops, restaurants, a theatre, and more. Inside the courtyard is an abundance of plants, a large heated swimming pool, as well as an enclosed hot tub area. There is also available at no extra cost a nice exercise facility with both mens and womens locker rooms. Also there is a concierge to help you with things like packages, your dry cleaning needs, and more. Underground parking is available for a reasonable additional charge. The townhome features 2 very good sized bedrooms with queen sized beds, as well as built-ins including stylish desk / work spaces. Both bathrooms have double sinks, and one of the baths has a contemporary shower stall as well as a tub. Nice woodwork in the bathrooms and throughout this 2 story townhome with design created by the owner who worked alongside of the world famous American Architect and interior designer Frank Lloyd Wright. For a number of years now this home has been the San Francisco temporary residence of many famous world class singers, and musicians. The Ivory of the Grand Piano in the upper living area has been tickled by the very best. Also included in the agreement will be a maid service that will come in on a regular basis to clean, freshen, change and wash the linens and towels, to make your stay just a good bit nicer. If interested please send me a reply email telling me about you and anyone else in your party who will be staying in the townhome. Be sure to include the dates and length of stay that you will need, along with anything else that you can tell me that might be helpful, The cost of this home looking at it on a monthly basis would be $4975 and that will include everything except for a small PG&E; electric service pass along charge (actual billings only). Thank you for your interest.

post: Will be available late July. This is a typical original Sunnyhaven layout. Kitchen appliances are electric (stove, oven, refrigerator, dish washer.) Gas heat. head: 2+ bd. NOPA Flat, top floor, views, parking. ~ J.Wavro
post: Please contact: James Wavro 415-509-3456 jw@jwavro.com     San Francisco - Hayes Valley - Flat for rent Rent: $4900 Bed / Bath: 2 / 2 Type: Flat Term: 1 Year Parking: Garage Parking Fee: $0 Pets: Cat OK View: City Floors: Hardwood Kitchen: Gourmet Laundry: In Unit Outside area: Deck This is a top-floor flat in a two-unit building with great views.  The high ceilings, hardwood floors and wooden framed windows set the serene and sophisticated tone in this flat located in the trendy NOPA neighborhood.  The  main living space is large with a flexible floor plan and direct access to a large private deck.  Large built-in bookcases and a dramatic mantle around the working fireplace may remind you of your favorite vacation getaway in the mountains.   Large bay windows welcome lovely neighborhood and city views.  There are two large bedrooms, one with en suite bath with stand-alone claw foot tub, and another full bath in the hall.  A small third room may serve as a home office.   The kitchen is centered around a beautiful built-in wall cabinet and has a gas stove, dishwasher, disposal and refrigerator with in-door ice and water dispensary. Private roof deck. There is in-unit washer and dryer and one-car garage parking.  There is a large shared yard with dogs and children. This is a one of a kind flat in a great area.  Located in the NOPA neighborhood on Grove St. at Lyon, you can easily walk to the grocery store, coffee shops, banks, and the major transit hub of Masonic Street. head: Private elevator to your penthouse with Spectacular views ~ J.Wavro
post: Please contact: Joanne Fazzino 415-297-9777 jf@jwavro.com     San Francisco - Russian Hill - Flat for rent Rent: $10500 Bed / Bath: 3 / 3 Type: Flat Term: 12 Months Parking: Yes Parking Fee: $0 Pets: Cat OK View: City & Bay Floors: Hardwood Kitchen: Gourmet Laundry: In Unit Outside area: Deck Take the private elevator to your top floor penthouse with spectacular views of the City skyline, the E.Bay Bridge and the Bay.  Talk about a deck - this 2754sf home has a 665sf wrap around deck with views from Coit Tower to downtown Transamerica Building, the E. Bay and beyond. There are 3 wood burning fireplaces, high ceilings with crown moldings and beautiful hardwood floors throughout. Yes, it comes with your own full sized 30” front loadingwasher and dryer in the laundry room. The gourmet chefs kitchen has a Lacanche gas stove with 5 burners Two ovens (electric and gas ovens for baking and roasting), which is very hard to find. There are Fully integrated appliances and granite countertops.  Many cabinets, great counter space and a wet bar. Other features include: Video intercom/entry, Luxurious master bath spa like with Carrera Marble, and rain shower.   The great room is a combined family room, dining area and gourmet kitchen. Room for a dining table in the kitchen or put a large table in front of the large double paned windows and revere the stunning views day and night.  Another rarity in San Francisco - air conditioning! There are 3 bedrooms and 3 bathroom and great closet space.. This is the San Francisco apartment you have been looking for. Central location close to the financial district, N. Beach and Chinatown. Great public transportation, close to corporate bus shuttles and easy access to the freeway. Union Square is just blocks away.  A cat will be considered. 2 dedicated parking spaces are included. 1 year lease required.    Taylor Street & Pacific Ave, San Francisco, CA Joanne Fazzino 415-297-9777 jf@jwavro.com Find all J.Wavro listings on Craigslist List View  |  Map View J.Wavro Team Preview more properties at jwavro.com cl3764092018789-0 DRE # 01810008 Content and Images © 2013 J.Wavro

head: Timeless Beauty - furnished / unfurnished - 4BR - 2 parking ~ J.Wavro
post: Please contact: Joanne Fazzino 415-297-9777 jf@jwavro.com     San Francisco - Russian Hill - House for rent Rent: $9500 Bed / Bath: 4 / 4 Type: House Term: 1 Year Parking: 2 Car Tandem Parking Fee: $350 Pets: Dog OK View: City Floors: Hardwood & Carpet Kitchen: Remodeled Laundry: In Unit Outside area: Deck Behind a secure fence, down a brick garden path, is a very special home. Built in 1904, this home has been renovated, expanded and updated throughout the years. Now it is a stately 2 level house with a huge garden path in front of the home on 1/4 acre back from the street. And, there is a roof deck with panoramic views of Golden Gate Bridge and the Bay!  The house itself has a large porch designed with a trellis above the veranda  - perfect for casual dining and enjoying the lush garden in front of the house.  This is what relaxation is all about. The specially designed windows and multiple skylights throughout the house bring in plenty of light. This house is approximately 2800sf. Enter into a lovely formal living room with sweeping cathedral ceilings, a wood burning/gas fireplace and elegant furnishings -- this has been referred to as the conservatory great room.  Furnishings include a piano which is optional. The formal dining room is raised 3 steps up from the living room, separating it, but allowing for large family gatherings or formal entertaining. The large, fully equipped kitchen has plenty of storage, good counter space, stainless steel appliances, including a Viking gas stove, and a custom built hutch.  2 full bathrooms are downstairs. Also on the first floor is a library with built in bookcases and plenty of room for a desk and office equipment. This can easily become the 4th bedroom as there are pocket doors that close. Walk up the elegant staircase to find 3 large bedrooms -- 2 with walk-in closets -- and 2 more full bathrooms. Both have jacuzzi tubs and one has a steam shower. Lots of skylights keep this home bright throughout the year.  In addition, there is a roof deck with views of Golden Gate Bridge and the Bay. 1 car garage and a parking space in front of the driveway - 2 car tandem - for $350. This is an oasis in the center of the City. It doesnt get much better than this. Close to Michaelangelo Park with playgrounds within walking distance. A dog is negotiable. No smoking, please.  Call for an appointment. Available October 1 5, 2013 (Possibly sooner). Need some help finding what you are looking for?  Ask me about a customized relocation tour. The master bedroom features a CalKing bed, an en suite bath with soaking jet tub, as well as a south facing deck with city views. With a Walking Score of 97, this unit is steps from The Presidio Golf Club, Presidio tennis courts and hiking trails, as well as the restaurants and boutiques of Sacramento Street. It is also close to public transportation and Silicon Valley shuttle stops. Skylights through-out the condo let in the natural light for a bright and cheery ambiance. Great period detail throughout makes this Edwardian condo a great place to stay and call home in San Franciscos desirable Presidio Heights.  Other features include: In-unit laundry washer & dryer 1 car parking in private garage Water and garbage costs included Cable-ready This is truly San Francisco living at its finest. .. This apartment has built-in soundshield that thankfully keep outdoor sounds outdoors. The closet space is outstanding. There is a large private deck with this unit, great for plants, entertaining, patio furniture, or a BBQ. This is a well-kept corner building in a great neighborhood. The building and apartments have a lot of charm and character. We offer fresh flowers in the lobby each week. Its just a couple of blocks to The Presidio, Laurel Village, and Clement Street.
