head: CLOSE TO BART STUDIO/JR 1BR
post: About the unit: Ground floor Junior 1br/studio available for rent (likely available in August or September, though flexible for earlier or later dates) in a newer condo building, built in 2005, total of approximately 60 units. Though it serves more like a one-bedroom than a studio, it does not have a door enclosing the bedroom off from the remaining living space, so technically it is listed as a studio. However, the layout is such that it provides a remarkable amount of privacy; not that privacy should be much needed if living alone. Although it would work for a couple, this unit is more ideally suited for one individual given the overall size, 700sqft. Water and garbage are included in the rent. One year lease required and $1,000 security deposit due before move-in. *One designated parking spot in gated garage. *Gated condo complex. *Tall ceilings with track lighting. *Radiant heated flooring. *GE energy efficient stainless steel appliances: gas range, bottom freezer refrigerator, dishwasher and microwave (with the appliances and radiant heating, the PG&E; bill will rarely exceed $20 per month. The unit currently averages about $13-15 per month!). *High efficiency washer/dryer in the unit. *Granite counter tops in kitchen and bathroom. *Brazilian cherry hardwood floors in main living area. *Carpet floor in the bedroom/sleeping alcove. *Tile in the bathroom. No A/C but I have never had a need for it. Large school style windows swing open for cross-ventilation. Temperatures are very mild. No balcony or patio area. No pets. No smokers. No storage. Smaller closet (might run into some issues if youre a clothes horse). About the location: Perfect for professional commuting to SF or downtown Oakland. Even better/closer for someone working in the Emeryville business corridor (Pixar/Novartis/Zip/Jamba Juice/Peets/Whole Foods). MacArthur BART is 5 blocks away, a short 8-10 minute walk. The free Emery-Go-Round has a stop a block and a half away. One block away is AC Transit stop. Easy freeway access to 80 east/north to Napa, Sonoma, Sacramento regions, 580 and 24 east to the Tri-Valley, 880 south to San Jose and the Bay Bridge to SF. Great neighborhood eats and nightlife. Emeryville has Cafe Biere, Arizmendi, Los Cantaros, Miyozen, Lanesplitter, Townhome, Bucci, Wallys, Rudys, Bay Street Plaza, Public Market, Honor Bar, Prizefighter, Brown Sugar Kitchen. Temescal area on Telegraph has Bakesale Betty, Home Room, Asmara, Pizzaiolo, Dona Tomas, Burma Superstar, Koryo, Barlata, Lanesplitter, Kansai, Sahn Maru, KangNam, Genova Deli. Uptown Oakland has Fox Theatre/Fox Den, Le Cheval, Paramount, Hopscotch, Flora, Lukas Taproom, Ozumo, Pho 84. Rockridge/College Ave. gems are an easy 10 minute bike ride or one stop on BART. Berkeley/Elmwood neighborhood is 15 minutes away by bike and 1-2 stops on BART. Lake Merritt/Lakeshore Drive/Grand Ave. is a short 5 minute drive or 15 minutes by bike. Email if youre interested to discuss further.

post: Come live with us! We have a spacious 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom with loft apartment available to move into now. We also currently have beautiful 1, 2 and 2 Bedroom Plus Loft apartments available. Dont miss your chance to move into San Joses premier luxury apartment community! All of our luxury apartment homes feature full sized Maytag washers and dryers. Kitchens great for entertaining feature granite countertops, Maytag Appliances with gas range, dishwasher, disposal and refrigerator/freezer with ice maker. Your comfort is our concern, and all of our apartment homes feature central heat and air conditioning with programmable thermostats. Throughout your home, youll find distinguished features such as maple wood laminate flooring, great closet space, and a private balcony with dual entry and upgraded designer features. Nine foot ceilings and crown moldings or vaulted ceilings are a part of living here. Enjoy rare loft arrangements with spiral staircases and 22 foot ceilings in some of our apartment homes. Our Residents enjoy working out in our poolside fitness center, relaxing by our pool and spa, and cozying up to our romantic outdoor fireplace. Enjoy an evening stroll thorough our artistic, serene landscaping with the comfort of knowing that you are in a fully gated community. Join us the first Sunday of each month for a brunch prepared in the chefs kitchen of our clubroom especially for One Pearl Place residents. While youre there, enjoy the stone fireplace and large screen television. Our community also offers a professional business center with high speed internet access and conference room as well as a dry cleaning pick up and delivery service. For your convenience, we will gladly accept your packages when you cant be home to accept them. Directions to One Pearl Place: 5230 Terner Way, San Jose, CA 95136. NEW nickel torchiere in each bedroom There is a small hallway off the living room that goes to the bathroom and bedrooms. There is a coat closet as well as a large linen closet in the hallway. The location is ideal, within very easy walking distance of the Grand Lake Theatre, Farmers Market, Lake Merritt and major bus lines. Commuting by freeway is very convenient. head: 5 Room Full Floor Flat in EXCELLENT location
post: A 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom top floor flat located in a 2 unit, Marina style building orginally built in the 1920s. Features include recently refinished hardwood floors and fresh interior paint. The living room has hardwood floors, built-in shelves & cabinets, a wood burning brick fireplace, period details and parital views of Fort Mason and the Golden Gate Bridge. The formal dining room features refinished hardwood floors. The kitchen has been updated and it features tile counter tops, dishwasher, disposal, gas stove and microwave. There is a laundry room located adjacent to the kitchen with washer & dryer electrical & gas hook-ups. The bathroom is a split bath that has been updated and it features tile finishes and a bathtub/shower. There is a large walk-in closet in the hallway. There are 2 bedrooms located in the back of the unit which overlook the rear garden and deck, which are common to both units in the building. There is a 2 car tandem garage for this unit as well as 2 separate storage units. EXCELLENT LOCATION! 4 blocks from Chestnut St., 4 blocks from Fishermans Wharf, 4 blocks from Polk Street. Across the street from Fort Mason. Available July 1st. One year lease. First month rent plus security deposit of 1.5 monthly rent due at time of signing lease.

head: Furnished 1+BR Sleeps 4. Fab views! ~ J.Wavro
post: Please contact: Joanne Fazzino 415-297-9777 jf@jwavro.com     San Francisco - South Beach - Condo for rent Rent: $5500 Bed / Bath: 1 / 1 Type: Condo Term: Monthly Parking: Yes Parking Fee: $0 Pets: Cat, Dog OK View: City & Bay Floors: Hardwood & Carpet Kitchen: Upgraded Laundry: In Unit Outside area: Balcony Styled by an interior decorator, this furnished 900sf 1bedroom condo with a den, sleeps up to 4 people. You will love the views of the Bay, the City lights and the Bridge. Step outside on the balcony with a glass of wine or cup of coffee. This is a very large top floor furnished 1BR with a den. Just bring your pajamas - linens, towels, dishes, sheets, etc are all provided. Contemporary furniture and artwork. The curved Lucite window seat can accommodate 10 people. There is a 6x6 contemporary painting by Jeanne Jackson in the dining area. The dining table is an oval glass table top with pedestal and 6 chairs. In addition, there is 4x6 pen and ink of San Francisco scenes in the den by Marty Links. The kitchen is fully equipped and accessorized. The bedroom has a queen bed, Chinese armoire, Japanese blanket chest, a wall to wall closet, Art Deco glass and brass lamp and a Japanese painting of turtles in a beautiful frame. The sleeper sofa in the den sleeps 2 more people. There is a washer and dryer in the unit. The Portside has a pool and gym too. Just walk outside the building to the Embarcardero, walk to AT&T Park for a ballgame and down to the Ferry Building on a Saturday for the Farmers Market. Great restaurants abound in this part of the City and many are within walking distance. A pet will be considered. Water and garbage are included in the rent. The parking spot included. No smoking please. Available around May 1, 2013. Bryant Street & Main, San Francisco, CA Joanne Fazzino 415-297-9777 jf@jwavro.com Find all J.Wavro listings on Craigslist List View  |  Map View J.Wavro Team Preview more properties at jwavro.com cl3692692017822-0 DRE # 01810008 Content and Images © 2013 J.Wavro

Top floor has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The luxury master bedroom has a king size tempurpedic mattress and pillows. The master bathroom has a skylight and includes a rain shower and soaking tub. The main floor is an open floor plan with gourmet kitchen -- custom white lacquered cabinets, Carrera marble countertops, and stainless steel Viking appliances. There is a walk in pantry, a breakfast bar, dining area, family room, fireplace and 1/2 bath. The lower floor is a 2nd master suite with over 1200sf of open space. There is a queen size bed, full bathroom, 65 flat screen TV, sofa, wet bar, treadmill, laundry room and sliding glass doors onto the backyard. The yard is beautifully landscaped with a barbecue, garden, automatic sprinklers and dining table and chairs. There is also a queen size blow up mattress available. This home is fully furnished with modern, gorgeous furniture. One car garage, easy street parking, DirecTV, wireless internet, alarm system, Sonos sound system throughout the house, gas fireplace and all baby necessities are provided. All utilities included. Short commute to SF. 2BR/2+1BA Townhouse $2,095/month Bedrooms 2 Bathrooms 2 full, 1 partial Sq Footage 1,054 Parking 2 dedicated Pet Policy No pets Deposit $3,000 DESCRIPTION This townhome is part of the 130-unit Zephyr Gate community. Built in 2008 Zephyr Gate is a Green Point rated development that strives to be ecologically friendly and energy efficient. Exterior and interior design is tastefully modern: bamboo flooring on the main level, expansive layout and an open tread staircase. Tons of windows you can open to let in fresh air. Plenty of light dawn to dusk year round. Location-wise this townhouse has it all. West Oakland BART station is 5 min away by bike, or 15 min by foot. Jack London Square is a short bike ride away. Emeryville/Berkeley restaurants and shops are minutes away by car. It is especially convenient to commute to SF. I-80 ramp is couple blocks away, and it bypasses the traffic madness before the Bay Bridge toll plaza. You are literally one exit away from SF. Its faster to get to the SF financial district than many parts of SF itself. No pets allowed. Non-smokers only. Features: - Brand new stainless steel refrigerator. Brand new front-loading washer and dryer. - Dual master suites. Roommates will have private bathrooms. - Spacious, open kitchen with granite countertop. GE stainless steel microwave & dishwasher. - 2-car attached garage. - Central climate control plus ceiling fans. - Common area courtyard. - Very easy commute to SF, Oakland downtown, Emeryville and Berkeley: walk, bike, car or BART. - AC Transit bus stop steps away. head: BEWARE OF 6351 COUNTRY CLUB DRIVE - COUNTY CLUB VILLAGE
post: These people are liars! Theyre falsely advertising the unit available. They are NOT cottages, bungalows or anything of the sort. There is a big turn over and there are ALWAYS units available. They are dinky, dark tiny 500 sf, ugly, inadequately ventilated, dangerous apartments. There is NOT one amenity, not even as much as a standard dishwasher. The kitchens are so small you cant even get two people in it. There is NO privacy. None of the end units pictured are for rent, theyll say anything to get you in there. Theyre weird shaped buildings where you have neighbors on all walls even in the back. The walls are so paper thin you can hear your neighbors talking. You can even smell your neighbors though the walls. Once you pay the deposit, you may as well kiss it good bye and then some. They do NOT screen the tenants. Theyre renting to people with serious felonies, drug addicts, Section 8 and if you have kids, do NOT move in there. Check out meganslaw.ca.gov to see whos residing at those apartments. The maintenance man sweeps the grass as an excuse to spy on the neighbors. He snoops in on private conversations, looks in private windows and they discriminate against people with disabilities.

head: Orinda house avail July 1 - walk to schools
post: Opportunity is knocking! This lovely house on a quiet street is coming available because the current tenants are buying a home. The owner has no plans to move into or sell this property, so it could be yours for a long time. Why is this house such a good deal, where tenants tend to stay for numerous years at a time? (the previous tenant lived there 10 years) (a) Its within walking distance of two excellent public schools, Del Rey Elementary, two blocks, and Miramonte High, 1.2 miles. (b) The rent is generally lower than for comparable houses because there is a second unit downstairs, with its own entrance. Its long-term resident is a quiet, retired grandmother whom you will like. She shares the provided laundry machines, and has a space in the two-car garage. There is plenty of parking. Three bedrooms (one quite large) and two baths, all on one level. Large living room with vaulted ceiling and fireplace, dining area, eat-in kitchen with updated appliances. Beautiful views and plenty of sunlight. Large front patio and back deck, usable back yard with lawn and space for a garden. There is an automatic watering system already in place. Lots of storage space. Unfurnished (tenants furniture appears in the photos). The weather tends to be cooler in the summer, warmer in the winter than in Lafayette, Moraga, Walnut Creek, Concord, Pleasant Hill, Alamo, Danville, etc. because of Orindas being first in line for moderating sea breezes. Available July 1. No dogs. Please call Phil at 510-527-4847.

head: River View Penthouse - Antioch
post: One of the kind, spectacular river view - sit by the wall to wall window & enjoy the river as it flows to the Bay. You can even see the river from the bedroom and the back deck. City park is right next to the building along the river - enjoy a nice shaded walk & fresh air from the river. Walk to the yacht harbor - if you have a boat. Walk to Amtrak train station - if you commute by train Three shops on the first floor contributing to security of the building. No laud neighbors - the penthouse is the only residential rental in the area. Commercial/residential combo - use the huge living room for your business, and the rest of the Penthouse for personal. Free city parking lot next to the building - perfect for a small business. I am looking for a good renter with these criteria: 1). Pay rent on time with NO excuses. 2). Take good care of the house - $1000 deposit for security and damage. 3). Law-binding residents - NOT involved in any illegal activity. 4). Solid proof of stable income. 5). Solid proof of good rental history 6). Solid proof of good credit record Please do NOT apply if you dont meet ALL the criteria. The landlord will NEVER increase your rent if you meet the criteria. head: Remodeled 3bed/2.5bath single family house
post: Single family house available starting July 2013. This house is located in the town of Kensington, 3 miles north to the UC Berkeley campus. It is a two-story house with three bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, 1 living room, 1 dining room, a two-car garage and a huge backyard. The house is available unfurnished, although it could be furnished as well. It is recently completely remodeled with hardwood and period hardware. Living room (with full-wall windows) and bedrooms face the west towards the San Francisco Bay, providing plentiful sun light, a stunning Golden Gate Bridge view, and a wonderful sense of space. The large backyard has a spacious deck and plenty of outdoor furniture - a great place for an outdoor meal. There are shops within walking distance in downtown Kensington just about everything including bakery, cafe, grocery store, hardware and gas station. The AC transit buses stop around the corner that links directly to BART, the UC Berkeley campus, and the San Francisco city. About 10 minutes driving to the UC Berkeley campus, freeway, the Solano Avenue shops and the El Cerrito plaza. Award-winning public schools, exceptional police protection, friendly small town feel, yet with convenient access are hallmarks of life here. The location is quiet with lots of trees, with no traffic in front because it is on a non-through street. If you enjoy biking, hiking or swimming, the Tilden Regional Park is less than a mile away. Parks, tennis and basketball courts, a public library and a top-ranked elementary school are within 5 minutes walking distance.

Leave the building through our States Street exit and walk down the longest uninterrupted block in the city with its wild hillside, quirky houses and even a castle. Anything you need is within walking distance. Nightlife and the historic Castro Theater. Shops ranging from Haight Street boutiques, bookstores, and antiques to a 24 hour pharmacy and hardware stores. Great variety of restaurants, ranging from burritos to fine dining and bars at all price ranges. Great transportation by bus, trolley, and BART to downtown, Chinatown, the Mission district, the Ferry Building, Fishermans Wharf. Call (415) 285-7379 for appointment.

head: Big remodeled apt w/private yard nr Berkeley, Rockridge, hwy 24
post: Now you can rent a remodeled 1-bedroom on the Berkeley border - available anytime between July 20 and August 1. One year lease required. Please read this entire ad before contacting me. (That will save us both same back-and-forth over email.) Four photos are below, but you can see more photos here: http://www.lonestartours.com/trevorlevine/5740maccall/ - 650 square feet (bigger than many 2-bedroom apartments) - Ground floor of a quiet triplex - Sunny windows on three sides - Two closets - Enormous kitchen with granite counters and huge sunny window - Private fenced yard area - Offstreet parking - Easy street parking for your guests Also, the front door opens to the yard. So unlike condos in larger complexes UPS can deliver packages directly to your front door (instead of leaving yellow sticky notes, and making you pick up your packages). There is no laundry in the building, but theres a door-to-door laundry service I use. They pick up your dirty laundry, wash, dry, fold, and return it perfectly folded to your door. Its about $30 for two weeks of laundry (per person). There are also laundrimats nearby. The only utility I pay for is trash pickup. You are responsible for water, gas, electric, phone, cable TV, etc. If you want to, you can chip in for a third of my high speed Internet bill and share my wifi. There is a very large closet in the bedroom, and a small closet in the hallway. GREAT LOCATION: - Halfway btwn the Ashby BART and Rockridge BART stations - 17 blocks from Berkeley Bowl - 7 blocks from the entrance to hwy 24 - Walking distance to the Nomad Cafe - Quiet street with trees, not a through street - The only people who drive here are the neighbors. Most neighboring houses are owner-occupied. That means most of the neighbors are mature and stable people. Its not a transient neighborhood. RECENT RENOVATIONS: - New double pane windows - New pergo flooring (looks like hardwood) - New paint - New fridge - New granite countertop - New stainless steel kitchen sink - New bathroom vanity - New faucets, doorknobs, ceiling lights, etc - The building features new exterior paint, gutters, and landscaping. Im a freelance writer who lives/works right above this apartment. I and the back tenant are both very quiet. However, I sing for 30-45 minutes per day, and you will hear that. I need a quiet environment to concentrate. Ive also promised my back tenant and my roommate that this is a quiet building. So if you have a very quiet lifestyle, Im willing to compensate you for it. The official rent is $1499, but I offer a good tenant rebate of $100/month. The rebate is for paying rent on time, maintaining renters insurance, not smoking anywhere on the premises, and not disturbing me or the back tenant. If you are a single person, I offer an additional $45/month discount. Thats because there will be less wear-and-tear and also less trash, so my trash collection bill will be smaller. The current tenant tells me that in her living room and bedroom (which are right under my office), the loudest volume that doesnt disturb me is music played directly from her laptop, at the max level, with no attachable speakers. (Or TV at a comparable volume level.) In her kitchen, using attachable computer speakers doesnt bother me. Thats because its not right under my office. Most of my current and past tenants have qualified for the rebate every single month. In the worst cast, a tenant forfeited the rebate one month out of the whole year. If your rental application is accepted, I will give you contact information for my current and past tenants so you can confirm this. The security deposit is $1,500. Cats OK. Absolutely no dogs. I imagine this apt will rent quickly, even though its not available until August 1st. If you are not able to come see the apartment in person right away, you can either (1) send a Bay area friend to view it for you or (2) ask me to email you a rental application, and apply without seeing it. I will be checking your credit, as well as your landlord and employer references, so please only contact me if all that will check out. I will show the apt at these times: Sun 6/23 at 2pm Mon 6/24 at 6:30pm Each showing only takes 5 minutes, and once a showing is over I will be leaving for other appointments. So if youd like to come, please arrive promptly or a few minutes early. (If you get here early, you can wait in the driveway or the fenced part of the front yard.) 5740 Maccall St, Oakland 94609 (corner of 58th St).

head: Executive Home in Bayport - 2 Yards
post: Due to relocation for work, this newly constructed (2008) 5 Bedroom / 4 Bathroom furnished Bayport home will be available for rent on August 1st. This 2 story home offers it all, including hardwood floors, stone and stainless steel kitchen, 2 gas fireplaces (including gas logs), beautiful curtains, huge laundry room with new front loading W/D, 3 car attached garage, a back yard and a separate private patio, perfect for lounging or enjoying a BBQ on the included grass grill. Enjoy the included 60 inch high definition flat panel TV and integrated surround sound, in-ceiling audio system. Attached to the master bedroom is a massive bathroom with large tub and separate shower as well as a huge (10 x 20) walk-in closet with new built-in just added. The house has been freshly painted and contains large storage cabinet in the garage and multiple storage rooms in the home. The home supports a separate living room and formal family room, complete with piano, fireplace and beautiful furnishings. There are numerous parks within the Bayport development and this property is located overlooking one. This home has great access to San Francisco, Oakland and the entire Bay Area with close proximity to the Ferry and to BART. Its an 800 meter walk to the Ferry which takes you to San Francisco and stops at the Ferry Building and Fishermans Wharf: http://sanfranciscobayferry.com/route/alameda/sffb Its a short 2.5 mile distance to the Oakland Lake Merritt BART station, which provides free parking. Once on BART, you have access to the entire Bay Area and can be in downtown San Francisco in 10 minutes: http://www.bart.gov/stations/lake/directions.aspx The newly constructed Ruby Bridges K-5 Elementary School (K-5) is located less than 100 meters from the front door, http://rubybridges.alamedausd.ca.schoolloop.com/ The house is nicely furnished with brand new furnishings. Must see to appreciate. If interested, please provide your phone number so that I may contact you.

head: Fully Furnished Newer 7BR/6.5BA custom home, Serene and Tranquil. Also offered t
post: Fully Furnished Newer 7BR/6.5BA custom home, Serene and Tranquil. Also offered to sell for $18 million. 7BD/6.5BA $16,500 Arnerich Road Los Gatos, CA 95032 View Map American Marketing Systems Inc (408) 394-9334 www.amsires.com Description Description The main house is 7500 sq ft and includes 7 bedrooms 6 1/2 baths a theater/ wine cellar. The home is a fully automated custom built, energy efficient structure built with very thick 24 walls. Entire structure was covered in stone imported from France and Jerusalem. Interior of home is finished with Venetian plaster and flooring from old churches throughout Europe. Wooden beams are hand carved recycled timbers imported from France. Additionally, there is a pool house, swimming pool, waterfall feature, hot tub and a large 3 car detached workshop/garage. The property is 2 1/2 acres in size, fenced, fully landscaped and comes with gardener and pool service . Guest house, fully independent, is also available for additional cost Schools: - Blossom Hill Elementary/ Los Gatos Union - Raymond J. Fisher Middle school - Los Gatos High school/Los Gatos-Saratoga Joint Union - Tenant to verify schools and availability Other Details: - Sorry No smoking, Outdoor pet is considered - House is fully furnished. head: Well Appointed Executive Home in North Valley of San Jose, Bentley Park Communit
post: Well Appointed Executive Home in North Valley of San Jose, Bentley Park Community. 3BD/2.5BA $3,195 2085 Croner Place San Jose, CA 95131 View Map AMP Property Management (650) 587-5059 or (408) 624-0837 anthony@amppropertymanagement.com www.amppropertymanagement.com Description AMP Property Management is pleased to present this well appointed 2005 Executive Home in the Flickinger North Valley, Bentley Park Community. Recently constructed in 2005, the home offers 3 bedrooms, and 2 1/2 Baths, approximately 1,929 Sq. ft. Do not disturb occupants, please call to schedule a tour of the property. The property will be available for occupancy on the 15th of July. This cottage style home was built by award winning home and community developer, Pulte Homes. This executive home offers a warm, open and spacious floor plan, with a large living and dining room combination and soaring high ceilings. The kitchen features a sizable pantry, and is laid out for both excellent counter space and efficiency. The kitchen was updated recently with new modern refrigerator and dishwasher. The family room features a fire place, and is well connected to the kitchen for social dinner preparations. There is convenient access to the two car garage, with professionally designed and built storage cabinets. An energy efficient glass slider at the rear of the house provides direct access to the professionally hardscaped, and beautifully landscaped back yard offering fragrant flowers and fruit trees. The property lease includes generous use of an excellent newer BBQ in the back yard. The upstairs is a short walk up a wide and comfortable stairwell, leading to a full bath, bedrooms, a full sized laundry room, and extra large linen cabinets. The home has a wonderfully spacious master bedroom, with warm and dazzling afternoon sunshine. The master bath and walk in closet are as massive as they are luxurious, and with a double sink and oval soaking tub, you will be pampering yourself in luxury everyday. The two smaller bedrooms are perfect for children of all ages, or your extended stay guests with large closets and a full size bathroom just a few short steps away. You will love the family friendly neighborhood and conveniences. The schools are wonderful, with the East Side Union offering both Independence for High School, which ranks a seven, and Vinci Park for Elementary, which is also a seven. You will have to verify exactly what school is available to your child. This home is literally steps from the VTA light rail station, and the now famous Flickinger park, which is fantastic for children of all ages. Ranked #42 of 98 attractions in San Jose, Flickinger Park is actually a total of 14.4 acres, with 19 picnic tables, 2 playgrounds, 2 basketball courts, one softball field, and one soccer field. There are always children to play with at Flickinger! Only a few short minutes away from major freeways, 680, 880, 101, and 237, you can get everywhere in the Bay Area easily. There are also many great amenities close by, such as The Great Mall, Costco, Ranch 99, SF Market, Fitness Centers (Club Sport, and 24X7). In the heart of Silicon Valley, you are conveniently located to Cisco, Brocade, Cadence, Synaptics etc. on Tasman/Great America/North First Street etc. North Valley is the area of San Jose near 680, 101, 237 and 880. Milpitas is on one border, and that’s the easiest way to place North San Jose in your mind’s eye. When you leave North San Jose you run into downtown to the West, and East San Jose to the South. It’s a neighborhood that features large lot sizes, views from the foothills, and a safe area for raising a family. Cisco is one of the largest companies in North San Jose. Square feet: 1,929 Amenities Flickinger Park VTA light rail The Great Mall Costco Ranch 99 SF Market East Side Union Bentley Park Community Pulte Homes Flickinger North Valley Sports Baseball Soccer Basketball Terms Rent: $3,195.00 Application Fee: $30.00 Security Deposit: $3,195.00 Available On: 07/15/2013 Created on 2013-06-22 19:39 PDT

head: Furnished Summer Rental: 2 Br + Den, 2.5 Ba w/Parking **Video Tour**
post: Furnished Summer Rental: 2 Br + Den, 2.5 Ba Townhouse w/Parking Furnished Short Term Rental (Min. 3 months between June and September) Rent: $9,995/month Property Type: Townhouse Bedrooms: 2.0 Bathrooms: 2.5 Pets: No Pets YouTube Video Tour: Click to view Patio Dining Room Furnished Dishwasher Hardwood High Ceilings Granite Kitchen Eat In Kitchen Walk In Closet Laundry In Unit This Mission Revival style 2 bedroom + den, 2.5 bathroom townhouse is one of the more unique architectural gems in San Francisco. Built in 1912, with the help of architect Arthur Joseph Laib, the founder of Matson Navigation Co. built these townhomes across from his own mansion for his sea captains, according to neighborhood legend. This home has been featured in Gentry Magazine and SF Chronicle: http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?f=/c/a/2010/02/24/SBUL1BP4LR.DTL Located on one of Pacific Heights most desired blocks, and very close to Lafayette Park, this townhouse feels like one youd find in London. Stately but comfortable, the furnishings and decor make a delightful home. The first floor features fully furnished formal living and dining rooms, and a spacious and bright eat-in kitchen outfitted with everything you need to create gourmet meals. It features stainless steel appliances including a gas range, dishwasher, side by side refrigerator and granite countertops. On summer days, a patio provides the perfect space to barbecue. A half bath and laundry room complete the first floor. Two bedrooms are located on the second level; each have wonderfully placed windows to allow light to stream in. The spacious master bedroom has a large bathroom ensuite. The second bedroom can sleep two with a trundle bed. An office/den/library completes the 2nd floor. Square footage of 2,000 is approximate. No pets please. Offered for a 3 month minimum lease anytime between June 1 and September 30. * Offered fully furnished only * Garage parking is included * Bi-weekly housekeeping is included * Owner pays all utilities * Washer and dryer in unit Tracy Ballard Phone: 415.797.8296 DRE #01870837   Are you new to San Francisco? Relocating for a new job? Tired of endlessly searching the web for a new apartment or house but dont really know the area? We are here to help!!! At Bay Area Rental Advisors, we realize relocating to a new city can be quite a challenge. To expedite the process, we offer a personal concierge service to help your rental search be the most cost-effective and time-efficient for you! We offer a Private Tour during which one of our local Agents will show you properties that fit your specific needs. We network with other agents and management companies to find properties that are not listed on Craigslist! During the tour, our Agent will also point out the major areas of interest, including specific neighborhoods, hot spots, transportation hubs, shopping areas, farmers markets, dining, and more. This will prepare you to lease immediately or give you the security you need for a great jump start in the rental process. Call Tracy Ballard today for more information: 415.797.8296. Bay Area Rental Advisors  POSTED BY REALTYMX TRG532

head: Sunny and spacious NOPA studio!
post: Large studio with hardwood floors, large kitchen, extra room that can be used as a dining area or office, and walk-in closet large enough to fit a bed. Unit is approx. 450 to 500 square feet. - Walk-in closet with lots of storage space - Kitchen with lots of storage space - New oven installed in November 2012 -Water and garbage included in rent. - Laundromat is just down the street. - Very close to bus stops, grocery stores, and restaurants. - Street parking, or there might be an option to rent one of the garages for a monthly fee. We will look into this for you if you ask. Fantastic location, within walking distance to: - Lucky Supermarket, 2 minute walk - Trader Joes, 10 minute walk - Target (opening in the fall), 10 minute walk - Haight street, 10 minute walk - Divisadero street, 10 minute walk Close to the following bus lines: - 5, 21, 31, 38, 43, 44, 24 AVAILABLE JULY 1ST Maximum occupancy: 2 people Please email to let us know when you would like to swing by and check out the apartment. We have very accommodating schedules. Application fee is $50 per person. If you have any questions about the apartment, please email! Thank you!

head: Late 1920s Inner Mission 1bd; Hardwood Floors; Large Garage Available
post: First Showing: Sunday, 6/23/2013, from 3:00 to 4:00 PM. For rent is 190 San Jose Ave. #1 right on the border of the Inner Mission and Noe Valley. Great location just off of 24th Street with fantastic transportation options. Great layout. Living room and Kitchen in the front of the building and bedroom is located away from the street. Great detailing throughout; hardwood floors; lots of closet space Large garage available for rent with a very large area for parking. Some additional storage may be available. Coin-operated washer and dryer in building. Repainted, cleaned, and just about ready for move-in. $2650.00 /mo. rent $3150.00 security deposit $300.00 /mo. extra for the garage 1 year lease Tenant pays PG&E; up to 2 cats o.k.; no dogs Applications will be available at the showing. Applicants required to submit the completed application, written proof of income (copies of paystubs, statements of earnings, etc.), and credit information. No application fee if a recent, within the last month, credit report and score are provided by the applicant. $15 fee otherwise and we run the report. Please contact agent at the above link for more information. Agent: Jacob Klestoff, West & Praszker Realtors

head: Spacious Condo in Full Service Building 1br/1ba/1office/1car pkg
post: Available for immediate occupancy. THE CONDO: Large 1 bedroom, 1 bath condo, with a bonus office space, and in-unit washer/dryer (850 sq/ft approximately). PARKING: 1 car on-site parking is available. THE BUILDING: Located at 260 King Street, The Beacon is a full service condominium building with an outdoor heated pool, 2 outdoor jacuzzi like spas, fitness center, community event clubhouse, and more. LOCATION: 260 King Street is conveniently located in San Franciscos South Beach neighborhood. This is a master planned high-rise residential complex with appealing retail shops and restaurants on the ground floor including Starbucks, Safeway, Wells Fargo, a family friendly bowling facility, and Amicis Pizza, Melt (grilled cheese shoppe), a day spa and more. Cal Train Station and Muni F line are right across the street. Also, the Google bus, Facebook bus, and Genentech bus pick up station is within 1 block. Whole foods, AT&T; park, Financial District, are all within blocks.The lobby entrance and parking are accessible on Townsend Street side of the building between 3rd. and 4th. St. This is a nice, clean property and will rent quickly. Call Eric Johnson for a viewing appointment. 415-518-5513.

head: *Open House SUN 6/23 1-2PM* Newly Remodeled House for Rent
post: I am renting a newly remodeled house in Vallejos Beverley Hills neighborhood with 3 bed 1 bath. It is available June 24th. Everything from the kitchen to the bathroom has been redone, just look at the pics! Conveniently close to 80 and many food and shopping areas. The house is located on a quiet hill, in a great part of the neighborhood. It has a huge backyard which contains a nice patio area thats great for entertaining guests. Appliances include range, washer/dryer, and microwave. Pets are allowed with $250 pet deposit per pet. If you are interested, contact me at: David Jiang 650-867-0716 or reply to this post Open House this Sunday 6/23 from 1-2PM! Otherwise Im typically free to show the place after 7 PM on week days but please call to confirm a time first. Lease Terms: Available June 24, minimum one-year lease Monthly rent: $1,300 Deposit: $1,300 Requirements: Employment verification with last two (2) months of pay stub copy All applicants over 18 years old will be required to submit to a credit and background check.

head: 2br,2bth,2story,1 of a kind townhome nicely furnished Available July 8
post: Just in time for the Americas Cup in San Francisco. This large 2 bedroom townhome that is one of a kind designed in the tradition of Frank Lloyd Wright, will be available as of Monday July 8th for a period of 6 months and possibly longer. Located in the Civic Center / Van Ness neighborhood, within the Opera Plaza, this 2 bedroom, 2 bath 2 story townhome has everything. The ground floor entrance area of the plaza has coffee shops, restaurants, a theatre, and more. Inside the courtyard is an abundance of plants, a large heated swimming pool, as well as an enclosed hot tub area. There is also available at no extra cost a nice exercise facility with both mens and womens locker rooms. Also there is a concierge to help you with things like packages, your dry cleaning needs, and more. Underground parking is available for a reasonable additional charge. The townhome features 2 very good sized bedrooms with queen sized beds, as well as built-ins including stylish desk / work spaces. Both bathrooms have double sinks, and one of the baths has a contemporary shower stall as well as a tub. Nice woodwork in the bathrooms and throughout this 2 story townhome with design created by the owner who worked alongside of the world famous American Architect and interior designer Frank Lloyd Wright. For a number of years now this home has been the San Francisco temporary residence of many famous world class singers, and musicians. The Ivory of the Grand Piano in the upper living area has been tickled by the very best. Also included in the agreement will be a maid service that will come in on a regular basis to clean, freshen, change and wash the linens and towels, to make your stay just a good bit nicer. If interested please send me a reply email telling me about you and anyone else in your party who will be staying in the townhome. Be sure to include the dates and length of stay that you will need, along with anything else that you can tell me that might be helpful, The cost of this home looking at it on a monthly basis would be $4975 and that will include everything except for a small PG&E; electric service pass along charge (actual billings only). Thank you for your interest.

head: Beautifully Renovated 2BD/1BA w/Lake Merritt View!!
post: Welcome to the newly renovated Merritt on 3rd in Oakland, where youll find the kind of life youve always wanted! If youre new to the area, youll be amazed by what Oakland has to offer! As one of the most diverse cities in the nation, Oakland truly has something for everyone, and Merritt on 3rd is in one of the best places to enjoy it all! Ideally located just a couple blocks south of Lake Merritt, providing a breathtaking backdrop and offering views of the San Francisco skyline. Spend a weekend afternoon walking, jogging, biking, or skating around the lake. Were also just a few minutes from Downtown Oakland and the Central Business District, with its many attractions to keep you occupied. Explore some of the shops at nearby Jack London Square or take the ferry over to San Francisco. Experience some of the unique gifts and home decor pieces that Chinatown has to offer, or find a new favorite restaurant or jazz lounge. head: Pet Friendly Community with Pool and Beautiful Grounds.
post: Come home to this lovely one bed one bath apartment home today. This place has many upgraded features including a full size washer and dryer, large closets, some kitchen appliances, and cable connections. Visit Montecito Apartments to view this great place today. As soon as you pass through the entrance of Montecito Apartments in Santa Clara youre greeted with the calm, serene aesthetics of a modern Zen garden. There are sleekly designed areas throughout the property to unwind whether it be the fitness center, cyber cafe or pool. Walk around some more and you spot two friends jogging together, each with a dog by their side. The sun is high in the sky, the branches of the old redwoods swaying in the wind, and suddenly you realize that you havent felt this peaceful in a long time. Thats what Montecito is all about -- refuge. Most of the people here spend their days splitting atoms or figuring out the next big thing for any number of the Silicon Valley companies. So at the end of the day its all about retreating back to a relaxing, calm and invigorating apartment-base that is as centering as it is centrally located. So if youre looking for the yin to your yang (or vice-versa) Montecito Apartments in Santa Clara should be at the top of your list. head: Renovated and spacious 1-bed 1-bath, panoramic views, pets negotiable
post: Bright and quiet apartment with a practical and open layout. It has a combination living room and dining area, and a completely remodeled kitchen with a bar counter. There is beautiful hardwood flooring throughout, with carpeting in the bedroom. The bedroom is large and leads to a remodeled bathroom, and has very good closet space. There is a deck off the bedroom, and there are generous views of the Golden Gate and Bay. The views can be seen from bedroom as well as the living room. The apartment is very close to shops and restaurants on Polk, Union and Fillmore Streets. Downtown is 10 minutes away, and there is easy access to all of the northbound and southbound freeways. Pets are negotiable. For a dog of up to 16 lbs, an additional $50 per month will be added to the rent. For a dog that is over 16 lbs, an additional $100 per month will be added to the rent. The building offers parking for an additional $300 per month. The lease term minimum is 12 months. The apartment comes unfurnished. Mazal Bordo Relocation Agent 415 309 5667 www.mazal55properties.com

head: Super Cute One-Bedroom with Small Private Yard
post: 3336 Magnolia is a charming one-bedroom cottage located close to Home Depot near the Emeryville boarder. There is one-bedroom cottage and one duplex on the property. The tenants in the occupied units are caring & neighborly. This free standing cottage has loads of charm with several windows in every room so the unit enjoys good sunlight, hardwood floors, great wall colors; fresh green in the living room, soft lavender in the bedroom & bath & a sunny yellow in the kitchen. There is a claw foot tub in the bathroom with a shower ring overhead. The kitchen is spacious with a gas stove and refrigerator and a small separate alcove for storage cabinets & sink. The spacious and private rear yard is accessed through the kitchen and is completely fenced. Tenants pay for water, gas and electric. Surrounding neighbors have pit bulls but they are well cared for and very friendly after introduction. Multiple dogs of any breed will be accepted provided that they are well behaved. A separate deposit and rent are required. This is a great apartment but please be aware that a nearby recycling center draws many homeless & less fortunate folks through the neighborhood. Renters should be aware of these issues and mindful about safety. The property is fully gated and secure. If you are interested in this apartment, PLEASE DRIVE BY BEFORE CALLING, to be certain that the location works for you. The unit is available now. PADCO is a pet-friendly rental company that has been serving the North, West, Grand Lake, Temescal & Telegraph Corridor since 1990. Please feel free to contact us to learn about other dog- friendly apartments that are available in these areas. Well socialized dogs & cats are welcome with a separate pet rent and deposit. All of our properties are vintage, charming and range in size & price. We also have an Artist Colony Building, with affordable small studio apartments at 30th & Telegraph in Oakland.

head: Ready to lease!  Beautifully designed apartments
post: Welcome Home! Escape to charming Novato with our quaint shops, expansive open space and key geographic locale - Marins northernmost city is the hub to hundreds of exciting activities. Create your own adventure while experiencing the beauty and excitement of Novato. Millworks is designed to reach new levels of sustainability with the implementation of passive solar heating, high-efficiency water fixtures, sustainable flooring and an innovative living roof with growing vegetation. Residents will not only save money every month on lower energy bills, but also enjoy better health in their new home. Annual Festivities: -Novato Festival of Art, Wine, & Music - June -Infineon Raceway NASCAR & NHRA -Downtown Farmer Market - April to September -Bike Night - May -Nostalgia Days - August -July 4th Parade -Marin County Fair - July -Concerts in the Park - June to September -Stafford Lake Labor Day Fireworks -Salsa Festival - September -Holiday Shopping & Events - December Local Ammenites: -Choose for a a variety of excellent restaurants -Test your taste buds on world class wines -Horseback ride through Indian country -Explore historical museums and landmarks -Relax lakeside with a rod and reel -Discover the natural beauty of state parks -Observe birds and wildlife in preserves -Picnic in beautiful tree-lined parks -Play a round of golf -Bicycle under historic oaks -Hike forest trails and enjoy scenic vistas -Perus Old Towns shops and antiques Community Features: -Exercise and wellness room with state-of-the-art fitness facility (open 24 hrs) -Social room with TV & Wi-Fi (available to reserve for free) -Gorgeous rooftop garden featuring water fountains (with seating areas and night-lighting) -Whole Foods on site (delivers to our residents complimentary) -Underground parking (reserved spaces with individual bike hangers) -Controlled access (remote and key) -Recycling program -Concierge services -Secure storage cages -Alarm-monitoring available -Smoke-free community -Walking distance to downtown restaurants and shops -Easy freeway access -Sinaloa Middle School and San Marin High School -Close to transportation Home Luxuries: -Tile flooring in entryway, kitchen, and bathroom areas -Carpeted rooms -Bosch washer and dryer in every home (stackable, front-load, energy-efficient) -Air conditioning -Cat-5 wiring throughout home -Energy-saving dual glazed low-E vinyl/aluminum windows throughout -Wall and ceiling insulation meets or exceeds Title 24 energy code -Granite slab kitchen counters -Plenty of kitchen cabinet space -Long bar area -Bosch stainless steel gas range with microwave/hood combo -Bosch ENERGY STAR dishwasher -Ice Maker -Kohler faucets -Marble slab vanity bathroom counters and bath -Dual flush toilets 1, 2, & 3 Bedrooms Available! head: 2 bed / 2 ba - remodeled - garage + laundry - top of hill - $5,049 /mo
post: Hyde and Union Hyde and Union St - Top of Russian Hill - Open Floor Plan Newly remodeled 2 bed / 2 bath flat  -  garage parking for 1 car, motorcycle & bikes  -  in-unit laundry  -  open floor plan $5,049 / month Email the craigslist email address or call 415-662-8335 (no texts please) (more pictures below) Location This is a rare opportunity to call this newly remodeled and extremely private full-floor flat your home.  Located in a small, two unit vintage condo building with period details and a coffered ceiling, this unit is in a spectacular part of Russian Hill.  It is at the intersection of Hyde and Union St, and less than half a block away from Zarzuela Spanish Tapas, Swensens Ice Cream, Sushi Groove, Frascatis, Za Pizza, and all the other fine establishments on Hyde street that make this section of Russian hill such a desirable enclave in which to live.  This unit is close enough to the Polk street corridor to have access to all the hustle and bustle of Polk, yet far enough up the hill to avoid all the noise and craziness of Polk (and if youve ever been on Polk street at midnight, you know what I mean .... :-)  ) Transportation is incredibly convenient - you are steps away from the #45 bus line as well as having access to your car, bicycle, and motorcycle. Description 2 bedrooms, both with custom Elfa closets 2 full bathrooms with Toto toilets and marble flooring Open great room style floor plan with a combo kitchen-living-dining room - extremely rare in SF! Kitchen includes 5 burner Bertazzoni range with wok burner, Bosch dishwasher, & Viking refrigeration Beautiful hardwood floors with inlays throughout In unit private laundry (not shared with anyone) Garage parking spot is side-by-side, has has enough room for your car, a motorcycle, & bicycles ... all at the same time! ~130 sq ft of additional storage space in the storage area New central heating with a new Carrier furnace - evenly distributed warmth through the unit Double bay windows with southern exposure bring lots of light deep inside the unit New low-voltage recessed lighting in every room ensures the unit is bathed in soft light during the night The home comes Unfurnished Terms I am looking for a 12 month lease, but am open to longer lease durations.  No Dogs, No Smoking, Two Months Security Deposit Required, Owner pays for Water Rent:  $5,049 / month (includes garage, storage, and water bill) Availability:  July 18, 2013 Additional Photos

head: Large 1 Bedroom in Historic Landmark Building
post: El Mirador is spectacular Spanish Mediterranean property that was constructed in 1927. It is an historic landmark in Oakland admired for its excellence in design & construction. The building is well managed and has a wonderful tenant base. In addition to the original architecture & fixtures, tenants enjoy sun bathing, reading & socializing on the shared roof top deck with beautiful hilltop views. The available unit is a extra large one bedroom with hardwood floors, entry hall, a spacious living room with large closet and several windows. There is a full dining room with French door, a sunny kitchen with electric stove & standard refrigerator. From the front door there is a hallway leading to 2 ample closets leading to a sunny bedroom with large windows and walk-in closet. Across from the bedroom is a small but elegant bathroom with modern design and features. The bathroom offers tile floors, a Kohler bathtub/shower, pedestal sink and oversized vanity mirror. A very special feature of the apartment is a large private patio which is accessed directly from the dining room French door. The patio has part sun and shade and is perfect for reading, relaxing, gardening, dining or meditation. Unfortunately, BBQ pits are not allowed. The lobby of the building has an impressive carved wood ceiling & original wrought iron chandelier. The rent includes all utilities (water, heat, electricity, garbage & recycling) one secured parking space, secured mail & lobby, shared coin laundry room and shared outside deck/patio. Well socialized dogs and cats are welcome with a separate deposit. The property address is 491 Crescent Street 1 block from the Grand Lake Theater. Walk to restaurants, bars, cafes, shopping, Trader Joes, Walgreens, Safeway, Lake Merritt, and a fantastic Farmers Market with farmers, food vendors, crafters & more every Saturday of the year. Please call 510-590-6070 to schedule a viewing. The apartment will be available August 1, 2014.

head: Charming One Bedroom in Beautiful Victorian
post: On a lovely tree-lined street in West Oakland, 1022 Linden is a charming one bedroom apartment with many original details. The large sunny kitchen has room for a four-chair dining set, new counter tops, a stacked washer/dryer, gas stove, refrigerator and a backdoor leading directly to a huge yard. The yard is fenced and shared by all tenants with plenty of room for gardening, BBQs and relaxing. A private yard area for your dog can be provided for an additional fee. Those interested in gardening are welcome. Easy on-street parking is always available. Walk your dog one block to Lowell Park, walk to 12th St. Bart, or shop at the Old Town Farmers Market each Friday. The unit has a spacious bedroom with French doors and there are two large closets in the entryway and living room. The living room has a large window overlooking the yard. There are nice hardwood floors and high ceilings throughout. This first floor unit has a separate entry and a tiled bathroom with bathtub/shower. Located minutes from Downtown Oakland, Chinatown, I-880 and the Bay Bridge. Quickest Commute time to S.F. Well socialized dogs & cats are welcome with a separate pet rent and deposit!!! Please email terrygardner1196@comcast.net or call (510) 590-6070 to schedule a viewing. PADCO is a pet-friendly rental company that has been serving the North & West Oakland, Grand Lake, Temescal & Telegraph Corridor since 1990. Feel free to Contact us about other dog-friendly apartments in these areas! . All of our properties are vintage, charming and range in size & price.We also have an Artist Colony Building, with affordable small studio apartments at 30th & Telegraph in Oakland.

Price: $1625 Office Hours: · Tour by Appointment Driving Directions: Off I-80 East, take Peabody Road exit, Left on Cliffside Drive. Then Right (South) on Peabody, Left (East) on Marshall. Then Right (South) on Tulare, and Left (South East) on Brookdale. Total time from I-80 approx. 5 minutes. Nestled among mature Oaks and Redwoods, this stunning Tobacco-free 44-unit community, is tucked away in a single family neighborhood just minutes from I-80, shopping and entertainment, schools, parks, and Travis AFB. Enjoy nature recreation with access to Alamo Creek bike trail, a sparkling pool and sunbathing area, and lovely year round BBQ picnic area for entertaining. head: Charming Vintage One Bedroom
post: 512 33rd Street is a vintage 4-Plex located one block from Telegraph Ave in the Pill Hill/Lower Temescal community. Every main room in this 2nd floor unit offers high ceilings, hardwood floors, good space and light. At the the center of the unit is a spacious living room with crown moldings & an original built-in cabinet. At the front of the unit is a spacious bedroom with a HUGE double closet, large windows and a working fireplace! The bathroom is large & bright with shower/bathtub, vanity, shelving and nice fixtures. Behind the bathroom is a large eat-in kitchen with abundant cabinets and countertops, spice shelving, sunny windows over the sink, refrigerator & gas stove. Last, an extra bonus room, with more built-ins; could be perfect as a laundry room or extra storage. A new stacked washer/dryer unit can be installed for an extra $125 per month. Exit this room to a shared fenced yard and one assigned parking space at the rear of the large lot. The yard has plenty of room for gardening or food cultivation. Enjoy the yard for B-B-Qs, playing with your dog or relaxing. 33rd Street has a warm neighborhood feel. Walk 7 blocks to MacArthur Bart. Walk to Summit Hospital and surrounding medical offices. Walk to Walgreens, Neldhams Bakery, trendy coffee shops, cafes and numerous restaurants along the Telegraph/Temescal Corridor. There is a nice dog park nearby. Walk to Uptown night clubs, Arts Murmur at 24th & Telegraph and near-by theaters (Fox & Paramount). The apartment is ready for move-in. Please drive-by and call for appointment. PADCO is a pet-friendly rental company that has been serving the North, West, Grand Lake, Temescal & Telegraph Corridor since 1990. Please feel free to contact us to learn about other dog- friendly apartments that are available in these areas. All of our properties are vintage, charming and range in size & price. head: Peaceful, secluded cabin in the woods-rarely available
post: Love the mountains but hate the four hour trip, only to come back home after the too-short long weekend? Why not live there year round! Nestled in a wooded canyon surrounded by thousands of acres of parkland at almost a thousand foot elevation, this remote hideaway offers much of the best that northern California nature has to offer. Yet its just minutes from 680 and is an easy commute to both the Fremont and Dublin BART stations. Spend a few minutes here and youll know why the SF hoi polloi of the 20s chose to vacation here. Spend a few hours and youll never want to leave. The cabin features a charming kitchen with gas stove, ceramic tile floor and breakfast island; Berber carpet; a beautiful gas fireplace (that looks like a wood burner); built-in bookcase and shelves; original redwood deck; 8x10 workshop and full-sized washer and dryer. A downstairs room with separate entrance and deck makes an ideal office or studio, or can be used as a storage area. Community pool and clubhouse are a short walk away and private access to Pleasanton Ridge Regional Park offers miles of hiking and biking trails. Property is located within the highly regarded Sunol Glen school district. Kindly reply with your phone number and why this would be an ideal situation for you, and just as importantly, you for it. Available around mid-July. Pets exceedingly welcomed.

head: Enjoy Small Town Living While Being Close to Big Cities!
post: Whether you want to go to Oakland, San Jose, or Sacramento, our convenient location puts you near BART, the new Amtrak station, Highway 4, and the 680. But you get to leave the city behind and enjoy the pleasant, secure, good life that a small town affords. Designed by an award-winning San Francisco architect, the spacious, light-filled units have carpet, mini-blinds, central heat/air, dishwasher, outside storage, plus built-in oven, range and microwave. Some even have washer and dryer hookups! The park-like grounds have tranquil canals, fountains, and bridges running throughout the complex, which you can enjoy from your balcony or patio. Recreational facilities include a sports court, pool, spa, clubhouse and well-equipped fitness center. Were already $100 a month less than our competition, and we pay your water, sewer & trash which saves you an additional $55 to $85 a month or more! You cant get a place this nice for the same price in the city, and here are the other amenities youre missing out on: The County offices are located here. Farmers Markets are Tuesdays and Sundays. The Martinez Marina is your gateway to the Delta and outdoor fun, as are the numerous marshes and walking trails. We have a first class community theater, and theres a winery just a half mile from our door! Give us a call at 925-228-0760

head: $1750 Watergate spacious 1 bedroom Available Sept. 1st
post: Lovely 720 square foot 1 bedroom in Watergate on the 3rd floor. This apartment is on an open courtyard with a view of the bay from the dining room and terrace. It is quiet and light filled. The kitchen is beautifully remodeled with lots of cabinets (bottom cabinets have pull out shelves), granite counter top, and a deep stainless steel sink. The hall way, kitchen and bathroom are all tiled. Plenty of closet space plus an in unit storage room. The bedroom is 10 1/2 feet x 13 1/2 feet, and the living room is 19 feet x 11feet 2inches. The living room, bedroom and dining room have bamboo floors that are sound insulated. The living room has a sliding glass door opening onto the terrace. The toilet and bathtub/shower are in a room with a door and the sink and vanity are next to it with plenty of storage space. Watergate is a large condo development with 4 pools, hot tubs, a gym, tennis courts, a recreation center with a large flat screen tv, billiards room, and lots of comfy seating. There is a boardwalk and a park with beautiful sunset view and shore birds. We can move everything out, but if you need a furnished apartment we have some things that we can leave, like a dining room table, queen sized bed and a lazy boy sofa.

head: America's Cup Fully Furnished 1 Bed/Bath Sunny & Views!
post: Rent - $3,500 a month (first month pro-rated) Availability - July 7th to Sept. 30th (3 months) Move in Requirements- 1st month rent + security deposit of $1,250 This is a furnished, bright, 1930s apartment. It has a classic San Francisco feel. This 1 bedroom apt. is located on the charming street of Fillmore and is just 3 blocks away from Alta Plaza Park. Just a trip down the hill will take you to the Marina Green with great viewing for Americas Cup this summer! The Neighborhood has an abundance of restaurants, cafes & boutiques. We are surrounded by over 8 different cuisines and even a fresh bakery! There is never be a lack of variety for any meal! A San Francisco must-have pizza (Delfinas) is just a block away or you may even pick up groceries at Mollie Stones just down the block to feel at home. For those that love picnics or work-outs... just a few blocks walk is Alta Plaza park, offering a great run or just fantastic views for a picnic. Public Transportation: Within a few blocks from our doorstep you can catch a single bus to coast down to the Mission District, or take it the other direction into the active Marina district. There are also several bus lines you can take into downtown, Japan Town or China Town. Transportation will not be a problem. Apartment Details: Wireless Internet Desktop Mac Printer Flat Screen TV with Cable & TiVo Queen Sized Bed Fridge, Microwave, Stove Toaster, Plates, Cutlery, French Press, Pots and Pans Shower/Tub, towels, hair dryer iPod speakers Access to Washer and Dryer in the building

head: Beautiful 3br/3ba townhouse
post: Beautiful 3br/3ba, 1905 sq. ft., townhouse in the heart of Walnut Creek ($3000/month + utilities). The house is located in a very quiet and family oriented neighborhood in the Village at Walnut Creek with three excellent schools nearby: Bancroft Elementary (K-4), Foothill Middle (5-8), and Northgate High. The house is close to downtown of Walnut Creek, major shopping areas and highways 24 and 680 and a short walk to Heather Farm Park. On the first floor there are foyer with tile floor and marbled walls, sunny living room (with fireplace) and dinning room, large bedroom, large kitchen with granite counters and breakfast area with tile floor, and a full bathroom with tile floor and granite vanity top. Wood stairs leads to the second floor with a large master bedroom with a walk-in closet and a large master bathroom with tile floor, vanity top. This bathroom has a tub, shower with marble walls and toilet with a separate entrance. On the second floor there is also a third bedroom and a third bathroom. Attached is a two-car garage with some extra-shelved storage space and laundry area. There is a central AC and heating system. There is a small fenced backyard (wood patio will be replaced with stone-based patio in summer). There are swimming pool and tennis court on premises. head: Refreshingly Different! "Treehouse", 6 min stroll downtown
post: Roomy, sun-drenched two bedroom/1 & 1/4 bath house with personality plus. Birds, flowers, fruit trees, winter creek, and plenty of deer. You are in nature here, yet in a few minutes you can walk to coffee houses, bakeries, library, Los Gatos high school, great restaurants and boutiques, the post office, and hiking/biking trails. One covered parking space and shared laundry facilities. Theres no cookie-cutter floor plan -- you can designate your own room uses. The inside space is about 1200-1400 square feet, a fabulous getaway for one or two people. Living room/dining room with window wall and built-in shelves/cabinets (think reading nook) overlooks jungle. Open kitchen with skylight gives on to a 20 x 30 sun deck for spacious entertaining in the treetops. Both bedrooms (or one bedroom, one office/guest room) have skylights and ceiling fans. One has a skylit closet area, the other features an alcove with a vanity sink. The bathroom between bedrooms has a random patterned handmade tile floor (madly colorful) and an opening skylight. Youll feel youve traveled long and far to reach this tranquil haven, and yet youre just a few blocks from the heart of the hopping village of Los Gatos. Freeway access is less than half a mile away to whisk you to the beaches at Santa Cruz or Monterey, or up the bay to San Francisco in under an hour. If this is the place youve been dreaming of, youll know the instant you lay eyes on it. Available for move-in probably about July 15 We are in the process of upgrading, repainting, putting in new cork flooring and bath vanity, etc.-- so all is not yet picture perfect, but will be shortly! To schedule a viewing, call (408) 354-8308 or cell (575) 779-4259.

head: Artsy Live-Work Sublet
post: Very artsy Emeryville live-work studio, available from July 26, 2013 to probably between July 26 and Nov 26, 2014. Its 1380 sq ft and, besides the large main room in the shot, has a bath, kitchen and 200 sq ft office on the ground floor and a bedroom, office [or 2nd bedroom] and open loft [170 sq ft] on the second floor. A comfortable space for two tenants. Adjacent spaces in the same building include a recording studio, music lesson studio and floral designer space -- all occupied by very friendly and artistic tenants. The available space also includes a separate 325 sq woodworking shop. Other features: Off the Powell St exit in Emeryville. Excellent central location to Bay Area on gated lot, off the street, in secure hood, with free Eville shuttle bus to BART, one block from Amtrak. Good heat, 18 ceilings, concrete floors, lots of storage, and artistic environment. WIFI, Comcast & Direct TV available, if desired. Fully furnished and equipped: - Danish wood-burning stove - Full kitchen: stove-oven, fridge, dishwasher, stacked washer-dryer, microwave, toaster oven, coffee maker, espresso maker & milk steamer, toaster, popcorn maker, pannini press, food processor, garbage disposal. Office equipment use: two PCs, copier, printer, fax. Charmglow gas BBQ grille. Walking distance to Trader Joes, Bay Street, restaurants & shops. Loads of natural light. Offstreet parking and basketball court. Rent: $2,500/mo, PG&E; & garbage not included.

post: The condominium is bright and quiet with a great layout, and has a remodeled granite kitchen and a large combination living room and dining room. Shops and restaurants on Union Street are 2 blocks away, and those on Polk Street are 4 blocks away. Fort Mason and Marina Green are also within walking distance. There is very easy access to the 101 North freeway, and major transportation lines on Lombard and Van Ness Streets are 3 to 5 blocks away. The Embarcadero is also easily accessed via Broadway Street. No Pets. The condo includes its own washer and dryer. Parking is included. Included services are water and waste, and biweekly maid service. The minimum lease term is 24 months. The condo comes unfurnished. Mazal Bordo Relocation Agent 415 309 5667 www.mazal55properties.com

head: Large and charming apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms pk avail
post: The apartment features charming details and beautiful hardwood floors. It is very bright and quiet. It has been completely remodeled and is in an Edwardian building. The kitchen has granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances, and opens to a large combination living room and dining room. There is very good closet space throughout, and both bathrooms are remodeled with marble. The apartment has a large master bedroom, and views. The location is five blocks away from Golden Gate Park, and is within walking distance to UCSF. It is also three blocks away from restaurants and shops around Carl and Cole Streets. It The MUNI N streetcar line is three blocks away and gives fast access to Downtown and Financial District. There is also easy access to the southbound and eastbound freeways. The apartment includes its own laundry appliances. There is an elevator in the building. Parking is available in the building for an additional $250 per month. Pets are ok. Water and waste and heating services are included. 12 Month lease minimum. Mazal Bordo Relocation Agent 415 309 5667 www.mazal55properties.com

head: Large 1 Bedroom Near Alamo Square!
post: This apartment is all about high style, detail, charm and comfort. It was recently redecorated and staying here will have you feeling as though youve just arrived at a chic and spacious hotel suite. You cannot beat the wonderful city location of this gem. The unit is very spacious, approximately 900+ square feet, and everything is brand new. There is a very large bedroom with a dresser, walk in closet and queen bed. The living room is bright and sunny, with bay windows overlooking a park, and pretty city views beyond the park. The living room features high-end furniture and finishes, including a 50 flat screen TV with cable, and there is wireless throughout. There are built in speakers in every room, so feel free to dock your ipod, ipad or iphone, and you will instantly have your favorite music playing all over this hip unit. The bathroom has been completely remodeled and will have you feeling like you are staying at a high-end hotel. The eat in kitchen, for two, is fully equipped with new modern appliances; refrigerator/freezer, stainless steel range/oven, cookware, utensils and tableware. The apartment comes with one parking spot that can accommodate an SUV. There are four washers and dryers on the first floor. This beautiful apartment is 4 blocks from the famous Alamo Square Park and only one block from the hip and trendy Fillmore Street. Fillmore street features many of San Franciscos best restaurants, jazz clubs, coffee shops, bars, boutiques, and more. Public transportation is within one block from the building. You can very easily get to any other part of San Francisco from this location. Destination restaurants nearby (walking distance) include State Bird Provisions, Dosa on Fillmore, SPQR, Harrys Bar, Jackson Fillmore, and many more. The famous Kabuki Spa is only 4 blocks should you like an afternoon of pampering and the best movie theater in San Francisco - The Kabuki Sundance - is 4 blacks away too. But...lets not forget to mention the world famous Fillmore Theater which features many of the countrys best bands and shows. StudioV Real Estate Rebecca Pearson, Broker 750 Van Ness Avenue, No. 402 San Francisco, Ca 94102 www.studiovsf.com

head: St. Helena Vineyard View Furnished Bungalow
post: This beautiful furnished 1920s Bungalow style home backs to a 100 year old zinfandel vineyard, just across the low stone wall so the panoramic views of the vineyards and mountains are spectacular. The backyard is the entertainment focus of this home with a refreshing pond that delights the numerous colorful birds with its gushing water fauct splashing on the stones below. You will find yourself spending considerable time enjoying the splendor of the views changing with the light of day. A large wooden table and lounge chairs await your entertaining or just a romantic time together. Inside you will find a wonderful chef kitchen with commercial gas range and large refrigerator surrounded by butcher block counter tops. No dishwasher in this classic kitchen. Master suite is large, bright and charming. Features queen size bed and over stuffed chintz arm chairs . The adjoining bath has a large walk in all glass shower with plenty of room for two. A large walk in closet is located to the rear of the master bathroom. Two other bedrooms are available both with queen sized beds and a shared bath between. The living room and adjoining family/TV area is well decorated in English antiques and comfortable chairs and sofa. The converted fireplace has functional and realistic gas fired logs. Wireless internet is available from AT&T; along with Direct TV satellite service, if you choose to purchase service. A Large 42 flat panel HDTV is included.. This home has a lovely cellar that besides being a wine cellar has a small HDTV and DVD player for entertaining children or adults in the privacy of this basement location which is accessible from the kitchen area. Washer and dryer is located in this convenient cellar location. Home will be available starting July 1, 2013. Owner will be available locally to manage the property during the lease. One year lease required. Shorter lease will be considered at a higher monthly rate.

head: Sunny Gourmet Ghetto; walk to BART; avail. early July
post: Cute, upstairs unit in the heart of a great Gourmet Ghetto neighborhood. Very short walk to downtown BART. Literally around the corner from Virginia Bakery, Cheeseboard, Philz Coffee, Trader Joes, theater district. Close to UC Berkeley, LBL bus stop, and more. Walkers Paradise score of 91. Foodie heaven. Two separate bdrm with large closets. One bdrm has a larger closet than the other. Could be used as a master bdrm and office. All electric efficiency kitchen. Updated bathroom. Good layout. Wall-to-wall carpet. New patio door and double paned window. New paint. Coin laundry on premise. Water & garbage included. Carport parking avail. Convenient to UCB bio/engineering/computer science dept. Convenient to LBL bus. Convenient to Downtown BART. (Easy commute to SF) Avail: semi-furnished with everything except a bed (furnishings not shown in picture) Avail: Linens, dishes, kitchenware, etc. also avail. upon request. Suitable for visiting scholars. Maximum occupancy: two No smoking. No pets. Security deposit required. Recycling--a tenant must Excellent credit required. Application fee $30 ($40 with cosigner). Move in early July. Email Apt Manager with your earliest Move In date and something about yourself and why you are moving to North Berkeley. Consideration given to applicants with flexible move in dates.

head: Contemporary Craftsman by Park School
post: This 4+ bed 3.5 bath contemporary craftsman home on Catalpa Ave in Sycamore Park can be rented to you as soon as we find somewhere smaller to live. Perhaps you have outgrown your house, or know of something for rent or share. We are hoping to downsize into a 1-3 bedroom, maybe on the mountain with a view in southern/central Marin. The house on Catalpa will be available as soon as we can find somewhere to move, so the owner is motivated to help an exchange happen. A 4th bedroom and bath is being added this summer. Features: Cathedral or 9 ceilings, radiant heat throughout, level yard, across the street from Park Elementary school and 6 blocks to Mill Valley Middle School. Whole-house water filters, air filters, and vacuum. No carpet, very clean and hypoallergenic, washer/dryer in double garage. 4/3 plus office, loft, and low-ceiling storage or kid room. Greatroom plan plus separate den, mature fruit trees and vegetable gardens. Views of Mt Tam and Bay tree, marble baths, maple cabinets, many built-ins. Can we help each other find the right place to move? Our timing is flexible over the summer and beyond. If you want to be notified as soon as the house is ready to show, but dont have a trade to offer, reply to Contemporary Craftsman and we will put you on the owners list. If you have a rental to swap, put Swap in the subject line.

head: Amazing Fully-Furnished Short & Long- Term Rental
post: AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER 26, 2013 FOR MINIMUM OF 1 MONTH. The perfect home base for your work or vacation! This cozy apartment is walking distance from San Franciscos financial district and just one block from North Beachs famous restaurants. This is a great neighborhood, walking distance to everything with insanely fast Internet. Comes with a pull-out sofa that converts to a queen-sized bed. If its R&R; youre after, youll appreciate the amazing custom kitchen, equipped by a Cordon-Blue trained chef, the comfy couch, and the big screen TV with all the usual cable channels. If you feel the need to be active, try the XBOX. If you insist on leaving the great indoors, try a drink on the roof deck at sunset to start with. If you get hungry, North Beach is just half a block. And if you insist on going into work, the financial district is a nice 10 minute walk. We didnt just make the place comfy either. We made it greener. Most lights are low power LEDs, the appliances are all energy-star rated, and the hot water heater is a high efficiency, continuous flow heater that combines energy efficiency with a literally unlimited capacity. The only limit on your time in the shower will be your conscience. One parking spot for a compact car and available on a first-come, first-served basis. NO smoking and NO pets!

head: Ideal Corporate Housing. Furnished resort-type house with pool/hottub and views
post: Ideal Corporate Housing. Furnished resort-type house with pool/hottub and views in Emerald Hills. 4BD/2.5BA $8,000 769 Lakeview Way Redwood City, CA 94062 View Map American Marketing Systems Inc (408) 394-9334 www.amsires.com Description This corporate home in the hills of the San Francisco Peninsula, overlooks the fabulous San Francisco Bay, away from the hustle and bustle of the cities, yet close to the Silicon Valley, San Francisco, Stanford University and Hospitals. This home is situated in the hills of Redwood City, with easy access to Hwy 280. Unobstructed views of the San Francisco Bay and Peninsula all the way to the East Bay Hills can be enjoyed from our master suite, family room, master suite deck, kitchen, living room, dining room, main deck, spa, tiki bar, and firepit areas. This truly is a house to enjoy and relax in. It is like being in a peaceful resort in your own backyard.  ~3000 sf home features a full master bedroom loft with family room, master deck area, full bath, and office (has been used as a nursery and walk-in closet in the past!). The family room is adjacent and features a large TV with digital cable, gas fireplace, and comfortable seating for six.  On the main level, enjoy our living room, dining room, and kitchen with very open floor plan. Our 2nd and 3rd bedrooms and den (can be used as 4th bedroom) are off the main level, with another full bath and powder room.  This home is ideal for those who enjoy the outdoors without leaving home! head: Renovated 2-level flat, 3-bed 3-bath and 2-car garage, pets negotiable
post: The renovation includes high-quality finishes and high attention to detail. The main level has a large kitchen with a breakfast nook, a formal dining room, and a big living room with a fireplace and integrated surround-sound speaker system. There is a small center courtyard accessed from the dining room, and there are two bedrooms and two bathrooms including a master suite. The remaining bedroom of the two on this level is currently configured as a walk-in closet but can be reverted to a bedroom upon request. The lower level has a large bedroom and full bathroom. It, too, has an integrated surround-sound speaker system, and is currently set up as a family room but can be reverted to a bedroom upon request. The room opens to a sunny landscaped backyard. The lower level also has a wet bar, a laundry room, and access to the garage. The location is two blocks away from Fort Mason and Marina Green, and four blocks from shops and restaurants on Chestnut Street. Union street is also within walking distance, and there is very easy access to the 101 northbound freeway. Pets are negotiable. The flat includes 2 garaged parking spaces. The flat has a built-in alarm system. The flat is offered unfurnished. The minimum lease term is 12 months. Will be available from July 15. head: WOW, huge two bedroom!!
post: Fourth & U 2020 Fourth St. Berkeley, California 94710 Phone 866-223-8043 Fourthandu@essex-l1.com Two Bedroom Available Now I opened the door, filled with anticipation. Could this be the one? Will this be the one that stands out? The hardwood entryway was long, as if my apartment came with a private hallway. On the other side? The perfect home! The dark wood cabinets in the kitchen gleamed under the lights. A door located towards the back of the kitchen proudly opened up to a private balcony. A quick trip through the kitchen for a hot cup of coffee, and a step through the patio door to enjoy some fresh air would be the perfect way to start any morning. The living room walls were decorated with large windows framing gorgeous views. As I looked around, I began to picture where my sofa, television, and coffee table would look best in the generous space. Slowly, I made my way to the master bedroom where I was again impressed by the unique style of this apartment home. A small hallway located between two large closets led the way to the master bathroom. I could feel the excitement bubbling as I relished the idea of having so much storage space available to me! With the Fourth Street shopping district so close, it would be a relief to know that I could easily store items from the shopping sprees I intended to spoil myself with. Beautiful apartment homes, great location, and pet friendly? Yes, this is the place for me! Call (866) 364-8986 to schedule a personal tour as this fabulous two bedroom apartment home wont last long!
